T02D1909:38a-1: tantra r'a je shr'i gu hya sa m'a dza t'i k'a / bod skad du /
T02D1909:38a-2: rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rnam par bshad pa //
T02D1909:38a-3: snying po byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1909:38a-4: thams cad ma lus rgyal ba'i gtso //
T02D1909:38a-5: sku gsung thugs dang rab ldan zhing//
T02D1909:38b-0: @38b lha mo'i tshogs bcas bde chen la //
T02D1909:38b-1: dad pas rtag tu phyag 'tshal te //
T02D1909:38b-2: gang zhig rigs lam dag pa dang //
T02D1909:38b-3: gsang 'dus dag la dad pa rnams //
T02D1909:38b-4: da ltar dad pa'i lam du ni //
T02D1909:38b-5: bde bar gshegs pas rtsa ba gsungs //
T02D1909:38b-6: de la brten te mgon po yi //
T02D1909:38b-7: sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba rnams //
T02D1909:38b-8: rnal 'byor rnams kyis rtogs bya'i phyir //
T02D1909:38b-9: ma nor tsam du bshad par bya //
T02D1909:38b-10: de la 'di mgo mjug tu phun sum tshogs pa lngas bstan te /
T02D1909:38b-18: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la mngon no //
T02D1909:38b-19: bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na zhes bya bas ni sdud pa bstan to //
T02D1909:38b-20: gnas ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes pa nas /
T02D1909:38b-21: padma la bzhugs so zhes pa'i bar ro //
T02D1909:38b-22: brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med ba nas /
T02D1909:38b-23: gang bar snang ngo ba'i bar gyis 'khor bstan to //
T02D1909:38b-24: de yang dang la 'di skad ces bya bas ni rgyud phun sum tshogs pa bstan te /
T02D1909:38b-26: 'di skad ces smos pas 'og nas 'byung ba'i rgyud
T02D1909:38b-27: kyi don mgo mjug rdzogs par 'dren pa'i phyir ro
T02D1909:38b-28: // bdag gis zhes bya ba ni gzhan dang gzhan
T02D1909:38b-29: nas brgyud pa lta bu ma yin pa'i don te
T02D1909:38b-30: // / rdo rje chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs
T02D1909:38b-31: rgyas pa nyid kyis gzhan dang gzhan nas brgyud pa
T02D1909:38b-32: las thos so zhes mi sbyar ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:38b-33: des na 'di skad ces bya ba nas //
T02D1909:38b-34: mngon par bstod do ba'i bar dag gis mngon sum du thos so zhes ston to ;
T02D1909:38b-35: / de yang bdag kho nar 'dzin pa ni ma yin te ci'i phyir zhe na //
T02D1909:38b-36: brjod kyis mi lang ba la sogs pa'o gnas 'byung
T02D1909:38b-37: ba'i tshig dang mi mthun par thal bar 'gyur pa'i
T02D1909:38b-38: phyir ro // thos pa ni sgrar snang ba'i gsung gi rnam pas so //
T02D1909:38b-39: de la gzhan dag gis brgal ba /
T02D1909:38b-40: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te gnyis med pa nyid pas //
T02D1909:38b-41: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa zhes bya bas chog mod /
T02D1909:38b-42: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba dgos ched med de /
T02D1909:38b-43: bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu de brjod par rigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:39a-1: sum na bzhugs pa'i dus na /
T02D1909:39a-2: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes brjod pa 'di dag rigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
T02D1909:39a-3: lan du rigs pa yin te /
T02D1909:39a-4: rgyud thams cad kyang 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes grags la /
T02D1909:39a-5: ston pa mya ngan las 'das so zhes ni rgyud gzhan gang las kyang ma gsungs so //
T02D1909:39a-6: yang de la dgos ched ci yod ce na /
T02D1909:39a-7: rgyud 'di las phyir gyur pa gzhan dag ci ste /
T02D1909:39a-8: 'dri ba po cig med na rgyud 'di dag ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur zhes rnam par rtog ste /
T02D1909:39a-9: de dag bsal ba'i phyir zhes skabs dang sbyar ro //
T02D1909:39a-10: de'i phyir 'dul ba'i thabs kyis gcig dang du ma'i ngo bor ston te /
T02D1909:39a-12: rnam dag sku ston ma yin te //
T02D1909:39a-13: log 'gro rtog pa thams cad la //
T02D1909:39a-14: so sor 'dul ba'i skur yang ston //
T02D1909:39a-16: de dag gis phyogs rnams su 'dul ba rnam pa
T02D1909:39a-17: bzhis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa ni 'di skad du
T02D1909:39a-23: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
T02D1909:39a-25: mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs par gsungs pa dang /
T02D1909:39a-26: rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan la sogs pa drug dang /
T02D1909:39a-27: kun du sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D1909:39a-28: de dag la sogs par snang ngo //
T02D1909:39a-29: de yang chu snod kyi gzugs brnyan bzhin no //
T02D1909:39a-30: de yang gdul bya'i dbang gis lha dang mi'i theg pa la sogs pa lnga gsungs so //
T02D1909:39a-32: gsung bar 'gyur ro zhes grags pa bzhin no //
T02D1909:39a-33: dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni de'i tshe na zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T02D1909:39a-34: 'di ni 'di'i dus gcig na gzhan ni gzhan gyi
T02D1909:39a-35: dus gcig na bya ba lta bu ma yin te
T02D1909:39a-36: / 'di ltar dus mtshon pa yang dus gsum la
T02D1909:39a-37: sogs pa dus nges par bstan pa ni ma yin
T02D1909:39a-38: / pa'i phyir ro // bcom ldan 'das zhes bya
T02D1909:39a-39: ba ni shes rab kyis bdud bzhi bcom pa dang
T02D1909:39a-40: legs pa'i yon tan drug dang ldan pa'i phyir bcom
T02D1909:39a-41: ldan 'das zhes te byang chub sems rdo rje'o //
T02D1909:39a-42: yang 'dir dgyes pa'i gnas na bzhugs pa'i phyir yang de skad ces bya la /
T02D1909:39b-0: ye shes kyi rang bzhin la @39b bcom zhes gsungs te /
T02D1909:39b-1: de rnams dang gang ldan pa de de ltar yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:39b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pas bla na med
T02D1909:39b-3: pa'i chos bstan pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i rten
T02D1909:39b-5: bshad pa de bzhin gshegs pa ni ji ltar skyes
T02D1909:39b-6: pa bzhin skyes pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes
T02D1909:39b-7: bya'o // de ji ltar zhe na /
T02D1909:39b-8: pha dang ma gnyes thog ma med pa'i dus nas
T02D1909:39b-9: 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i dbang gis pho mo phrad
T02D1909:39b-10: par gyur nas / de nyid rnam par sbyangs nas
T02D1909:39b-11: yang dag pa'i lam du 'gro ba'i phyir na de
T02D1909:39b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1909:39b-13: yang ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin 'gro ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
T02D1909:39b-14: dper na zangs dang gser la sogs pa rdzas kyi dngos po gcig la /
T02D1909:39b-15: ngan snod du byas pa'i tshe na mi gtsang bar 'dzin cing 'dor par byed /
T02D1909:39b-16: de gzhong pa la sogs par byas pa'i tsho na gtsang bar byed cing blang bar byed /
T02D1909:39b-17: de sku gzugs la sogs par byas pa'i tshe /
T02D1909:39b-18: phyag 'tshal zhing mchod par byed do //
T02D1909:39b-19: de bzhin du 'khor ba'i rgyu la dang po brgyad
T02D1909:39b-20: dang dgu pa dang bcas par spyad pa'i dus na
T02D1909:39b-21: ni smad cing spang bar bya ba yin la /
T02D1909:39b-22: de nyid thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du rnam
T02D1909:39b-23: par sbyangs pa'i dus na ni sku 'grub par byed
T02D1909:39b-24: pa'i longs spyod kyi gnas kyang yin la /
T02D1909:39b-25: de ltar zung du 'brel pa'i goms pa'i dbang gis 'bras bu nyid mngon par 'grub par byed do //
T02D1909:39b-26: 'dod chags la sogs pa chos lnga po 'di dag kyang /
T02D1909:39b-27: dang po'i tshul ltar spyad nang na song gi rgyu yang yin /
T02D1909:39b-28: de nyid rnam par dag par bsgoms na thams cad
T02D1909:39b-29: mkhyen pa'i ye shes skye ba'i rgyu yang pas nyes
T02D1909:39b-31: de'i phyir de skabs dang sbyar ro //
T02D1909:39b-32: de la sgra mang du ci dgos she na /
T02D1909:39b-33: don nges par bstan pa 'di yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:39b-34: de thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs ni gsang ba ste /
T02D1909:39b-35: gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin pas so //
T02D1909:39b-36: de rnams kho na snying po'i sa bon yin no //
T02D1909:39b-37: rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1909:39b-38: de'i btsun mo ni phyag rgya'i don to //
T02D1909:39b-39: bha ga la zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das chos
T02D1909:39b-40: kyi 'byung gnas de'i padma'i gnas na bzhugs par ston
T02D1909:39b-41: to // so sor snang ba'i 'byung ba nges par 'brel pa nyid kyi phyir na /
T02D1909:40a-1: chos kyi 'byung gnas la sogs pa mang po'i tshig yin no //
T02D1909:40a-2: de bzhugs zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D1909:40a-3: bzhugs pa'i sgra ni rnam par gnas so pa'i don to //
T02D1909:40a-4: 'dod chags la sogs pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la /
T02D1909:40a-5: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i thabs kyis 'dod chags la
T02D1909:40a-6: sogs pa mngon par byang chub pa'i rang bzhin rnams
T02D1909:40a-7: bya ba de kho na de'i bzhugs pa rang gi
T02D1909:40a-8: las yin no // 'byung ba gtso bor gyur pa ni ma yin te /
T02D1909:40a-9: 'das pa la sogs pa yang de ltar nyid du des yang dag par rig pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:40a-10: gang dag dang bzhugs pa ni brjod du med pa'i
T02D1909:40a-11: yang brjod du med pa la sogs pa dang ste
T02D1909:40a-12: / bshad pa grangs dang grangs las 'das pa'i don du bstan pa yin te /
T02D1909:40a-13: de'i phyir gzugs dang yon tan brjod du med par
T02D1909:40a-14: bstan pa des ni de rnams la de skad ces
T02D1909:40a-15: bya'o // de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra mo snyed ces pa ni /
T02D1909:40a-16: rab tu mang po'i don te grangs med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:40a-19: chen po ni bde ba chen po'i ye shes la gnas so ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1909:40a-20: sems can gyi don la 'jug pa'i phyir de rnams
T02D1909:40a-21: dang thabs cig tu bdag gis thos so zhes pa'i
T02D1909:40a-22: don to // de skad ces bsdus pa'i don du bstan mod kyi /
T02D1909:40a-23: de la gang gang bzhugs pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:40a-24: 'dir so so'i mtshan yang gsungs so //
T02D1909:40a-25: 'di lta ste zhes pa la sogs pas ni /
T02D1909:40a-26: nye bar mtshon pa'i tshig ste /
T02D1909:40a-27: de rnams kyi nang nas rgyu'i sgo nas nye bar
T02D1909:40a-28: shes pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la 'ga' zhig brjod
T02D1909:40a-29: pa yin no // rgyud las mig rnam par dag
T02D1909:40a-30: pa dang rna ba rnam bar dag pa phyag na
T02D1909:40a-31: rdo rje la sogs pa rnams ni dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1909:40a-32: lha kho na ma yin te /
T02D1909:40a-34: ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo dang /
T02D1909:40a-35: spyan drang pa'i sngags la sogs pa gsungs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:40a-36: 'o na ji ltar de brjod kyis mi la ra ba yin zhe na /
T02D1909:40a-37: bden te de ltar yin yang de rnams re re yang grangs med pa nyid yin te /
T02D1909:40b-0: rang rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i dbang du @40b
T02D1909:40b-1: byas nas gtso bor gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro
T02D1909:40b-2: // des mngon du byas pa de shes so //
T02D1909:40b-4: de dag la sogs pa'i zhes pa ni /
T02D1909:40b-5: rdul phra mo snyed kyi grangs te /
T02D1909:40b-6: nge rnams ni gtsor brjod par bstan pa yin no //
T02D1909:40b-7: kha cig na re rdul snyed pa'i 'khor lo smos na yod pa nyid pas 'dir ma smos kyang /
T02D1909:40b-8: sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang sngags dang spyan drang
T02D1909:40b-9: ba la sogs pa rgyud gzhan nas 'byung dgos te
T02D1909:40b-10: / de 'khor lo mthun pa'i rigs su bskor dgos pas /
T02D1909:40b-11: sems can gyi thabs kyi don mi 'grub par mi 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1909:40b-12: 'gyur te gtso ba ni gcig kho na yang kun dang ldan zhe'o //
T02D1909:40b-13: da ni gtsor brjod pa rnams bstan te /
T02D1909:40b-14: de la dam tshig rdo rje zhes thog mar smos ci dgos she na /
T02D1909:40b-15: lha rnams mnyes pa'i rgyu dam tshig gis byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:40b-16: de nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1909:40b-19: phyi ni 'jig rten pa'i bsrung ba rnams so //
T02D1909:40b-20: nang gi ni rtag tu dag pa'i sems la sogs pa lnga dang /
T02D1909:40b-23: rmang du byung bas gsod pa ma sogs pa ni dam tshig sdom pa yin no //
T02D1909:40b-24: bshad pa dam tshig ni yul la yul can gnyis
T02D1909:40b-25: su med ba'i rdo rje ni dam tshig ste mig
T02D1909:40b-26: sa'i snying po'o // chos 'di'i rtags kyis kyang gong du byung ba'i sgras /
T02D1909:40b-27: sems dpa' dang po'i rnam pa kho nar ting nge 'dzin 'di rnam par bshad do //
T02D1909:40b-28: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ni mngon du byas nas /
T02D1909:40b-29: da ni de ltar dam tshig bsrungs nas sku 'grub par bya ba'i phyir ;
T02D1909:40b-31: sku grub dang tshig kyang dgos te /
T02D1909:40b-32: sku gsung tha mi dang par bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1909:40b-34: de ltar tshig grub nas sems dpyod par byed de /
T02D1909:40b-35: sems ni rang bzhin dang bral bar yang mkhyen la /
T02D1909:40b-37: de'i phyir thugs rdo rje smos so //
T02D1909:40b-38: sku gsung thugs de nyid ting nge 'dzin med par /
T02D1909:40b-39: sangs rgyas kyi sku dang gnyis su med pa mi 'grub pas /
T02D1909:40b-40: de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rdo rje smos so //
T02D1909:40b-41: de ltar ting nge 'dzin thob nas /
T02D1909:40b-42: gang gis sems mngon par dga' bar bya ba de rgyal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:41a-0: @41a * // rgyal ba rdo rje smos so //
T02D1909:41a-2: lus rdo rje la sogs pa rnam pa lnga'i sgras
T02D1909:41a-3: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa lnga'i rnam pa
T02D1909:41a-5: ting nge 'dzin 'di rnams bshad pa yin te /
T02D1909:41a-6: de sgra rnams kyi rtags yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1909:41a-7: des na phyag na rdo rje dang nam mkha'i snying po dang /
T02D1909:41a-8: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
T02D1909:41a-9: sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang /
T02D1909:41a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' rnams go rims bzhin du gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1909:41a-11: de rnams ni nang gi skye mched kyi bdag nyid gnas pa dang /
T02D1909:41a-12: gcod pa'i rim pa bzhin du rnam par dag pa
T02D1909:41a-13: nyid kyi phyir na nye bar bsgrub ba la rnal
T02D1909:41a-14: 'byor pa'i de rnams byin gyis brlab sa pa kho
T02D1909:41a-15: na yin no // de ltar bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu ni /
T02D1909:41a-16: 'phrul gyi mig la sogs pa mngon par shes pa drug skyed par byed do //
T02D1909:41a-17: gal te thog mar byung ba'i sgras don yod grub pa la sogs pa yin no zhe na /
T02D1909:41a-18: ma yin te rigs kyi mtshan 'og nas mngon du brjod pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1909:41a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i le'u la de bzhin gshegs par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:41a-20: da ni rigs kyi yum rnams gsungs pa /
T02D1909:41a-21: sa rdo rje la sogs pa lnga'i sgras byang chub
T02D1909:41a-22: sems lhun gyis grub pa las chos lnga po 'di
T02D1909:41a-23: dag skyed par byed de lnga ni sa la sogs
T02D1909:41a-24: pa lnga'o // ji ltar skyed par byed ce na /
T02D1909:41a-25: de yang go rims bzhin bshad na sa'i khams ni sangs rgyas spyan /
T02D1909:41a-26: chu'i khams ni rgyal ba'i yum /
T02D1909:41a-27: me'i khams ni na bza' dkar mo /
T02D1909:41a-28: rlung gi khams ni 'phags ma sgrol ma /
T02D1909:41a-29: nam mkha'i khams ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
T02D1909:41a-30: de la nam mkha' rdo rje ni de bzhin nyid
T02D1909:41a-31: dang gzhal yas khang brtsegs pa la sogs pa rten
T02D1909:41a-32: dang rten can gyi ngo bo nyid rnams la /
T02D1909:41a-33: rnam par dag pa'i don bstan pa yin te /
T02D1909:41a-34: rang bzhin gyis yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:41a-36: nam mkha'i dngos po'i rkyen dang ldan pa'i rdo rje
T02D1909:41a-37: ni sgrib pa med par snang ba'i ye shes kyi
T02D1909:41a-38: rang bzhin nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i don te
T02D1909:41a-39: / de'i phyir yang rdo rje 'dzin pa yongs su 'dod pa ni ma yin te /
T02D1909:41b-1: rdo rje sems dpa' kho nar gsungs pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1909:41b-2: de'i phyir bdag nyid dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mi 'byor ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:41b-3: 'dir rnam par bsgyur bar byas kyang mi dgag ste /
T02D1909:41b-4: 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gnas pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
T02D1909:41b-5: gang du yang nang gi nam mkha' nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1909:41b-6: mngon du sems dpa' rnams brjod nas de'i don gyis
T02D1909:41b-7: gsungs pa ni gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa ste
T02D1909:41b-8: yul du gyur pa'i gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang
T02D1909:41b-9: / ro dang reg dang chos kyi rang bzhin gyi go rims bzhin du /
T02D1909:41b-10: gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i lha mo drug kyang gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1909:41b-11: sbyin pa la sogs pa drug kyang de ltar ro //
T02D1909:41b-12: de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' chen po ni
T02D1909:41b-13: sngon du yang btang ste go sla bas ma bshad
T02D1909:41b-14: do // de dag la sogs pa'i sgras gtso bor brjod par mngon te /
T02D1909:41b-15: gtso bo nyid kyis thams cad brjod du mi lang ba zhes pa'i don gsungs so //
T02D1909:41b-16: de ltar rdul phra mo snyed ces bya ba ni grangs med pa'i nye ba'i dpe bstan to //
T02D1909:41b-17: de dag ni 'khor gyi rang bzhin te /
T02D1909:41b-18: dang zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i don to //
T02D1909:41b-19: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bstan te /
T02D1909:41b-20: de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon du byas pa ste go sla bas so //
T02D1909:41b-21: de yang tshad ji tsam zhe na /
T02D1909:41b-22: nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa zhes 'byung mod kyi /
T02D1909:41b-23: re zhig mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rang rang
T02D1909:41b-24: gi dbang du byas nas gtso bo tsam zhig bstan
T02D1909:41b-25: pa yin no // 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa mi
T02D1909:41b-26: bskyod pa la sogs pa lnga'i sgras ni bdag gi
T02D1909:41b-27: zhe sdang la sogs pa dang /
T02D1909:41b-28: rnam par shes pa'i phung po la sogs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin bstan te /
T02D1909:41b-30: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes la sogs pas de dag rnam par dag pas mi bskyod pa dang /
T02D1909:41b-33: tshe dpag tu med pa dang /
T02D1909:41b-35: gnyis su med pa dang ldan pa'i lha rnams go rims bzhin du bshad do //
T02D1909:41b-36: rdo rje mi bskyod pa ni gang dag zhe sdang
T02D1909:41b-37: dang rnam shes ldan pa'i sems de'i ngo bor gnas
T02D1909:41b-38: par bstan to // gang dag gti mug dang de'i zlar byas pa rnams la /
T02D1909:41b-39: rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad de'i ngo bor gnas par bstan to //
T02D1909:42a-2: gang dag nga rgyal dang de'i zlar byas pa ldan pa rnams la /
T02D1909:42a-3: rin chen dpal de'i ngo bor gnas par bstan to //
T02D1909:42a-4: rdo rje 'od dpag tu med pa ni gang dag
T02D1909:42a-5: 'dod chags dang de'i zlar byas pa ldan pa rnams
T02D1909:42a-6: la de'i ngo bor gnas par bstan to //
T02D1909:42a-7: gang dag phrag dog dang de'i zlar byas pa ldan pa rnams la /
T02D1909:42a-8: rdo rje gdon mi za bar grub pa de'i ngo bor gnas par bstan to //
T02D1909:42a-9: 'dir yang sogs pa'i sgras gtsor brjod par bstan pa yin no //
T02D1909:42a-10: de la nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad ces bya ba
T02D1909:42a-11: ni de rnams kyis brjod kyis mi lang ba'i don
T02D1909:42a-13: nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:42a-14: til 'bru ji tsam pa bzhin du til mar gyis khyab ste /
T02D1909:42a-15: de dang 'dra bar nam mkha'i dbyings ji tsam pa
T02D1909:42a-16: thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
T02D1909:42a-17: khyab par snang bar gyur to zhes pa ni chos
T02D1909:42a-18: kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du thams cad sprul nas
T02D1909:42a-19: bzhugs so ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1909:42a-20: de ltar gzhir gnas kyi dngos po nam mkha' rdo
T02D1909:42a-21: rje ma gtogs par sngon du byas pa'i rtsa gcig
T02D1909:42a-23: bzhi pa las gsungs pa'i sngags dang /
T02D1909:42a-24: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams 'byung ba'i phyir na khro bo bzhi yin te /
T02D1909:42a-25: de ltar rtsa lngar mngon no //
T02D1909:42a-27: gdon mi za bar 'grub pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
T02D1909:42a-28: rgyu nye bar mi sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:42a-29: de dag gi don ni 'di skad du sngon du rim bzhin du gsungs nas /
T02D1909:42a-30: de'i rjes su mngon par rtogs pa rab tu dkrugs nas bstan pa ma byas na /
T02D1909:42a-31: shes pas rgyags pa rnams kyis nga rgyal gsal bar byed pa dang /
T02D1909:42a-32: bla ma dang so sor 'brel pas 'grub po zhes ston pas /
T02D1909:42a-33: mngon par rtogs pa dkrugs nas bshad pa yin no //
T02D1909:42a-34: da ni bskyed pa'i rim pa las 'ongs pa ma yin te /
T02D1909:42a-35: 'gro ba rnams skal ba thob pa'i mtshan ma gsang
T02D1909:42a-36: ba'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i sprul pa'i ched
T02D1909:42a-37: du thabs dang shes rab dga' bar bya ba gsungs
T02D1909:42a-38: pa ni / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa tshig bzhi bas so //
T02D1909:42a-39: de la tshig rnams sngon du byas te rnam par
T02D1909:42a-40: snang mdzad ni rnam par snang bar mdzad pas na
T02D1909:42a-41: de skad ces bya ste don du na byang chub
T02D1909:42b-2: chags par byas pa gnyis so sor chags pa la 'dod chags chen po ste /
T02D1909:42b-3: de la gnas pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa thabs
T02D1909:42b-4: dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid du ldan pa'i sems
T02D1909:42b-5: la yang 'khril ba'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin dang
T02D1909:42b-6: gang ldan pa de rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rnam pa
T02D1909:42b-7: kho nar bzhugs pa yin no //
T02D1909:42b-8: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni sems kyang thabs dang
T02D1909:42b-9: shes rab kyi rang nyid du 'khril ba'i don to
T02D1909:42b-10: // de lta bu'i don la snyoms par zhugs nas
T02D1909:42b-11: shes rab ma dga' bar mdzad pa'i don du 'khor
T02D1909:42b-12: de dag thams cad nyid kyi sku la zhugs par
T02D1909:42b-13: mdzad de zhes pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pas kyang
T02D1909:42b-14: gsang sngags kyi 'dul ba'i thabs kyis bsgrub pa shes
T02D1909:42b-15: pa nyid kyis shes rab ma dga' bar mdzad do
T02D1909:42b-16: // // bud med la ni skye bo phal po
T02D1909:42b-17: che 'dod chags phal pa dang ldan pas kyang dga'
T02D1909:42b-18: // // bar byas so // des kyang 'dir de dag mngon no //
T02D1909:42b-19: gzhan dag ni gzhan du 'chad de 'di skad du
T02D1909:42b-20: rtsa ba las gsungs pa'i tshig dang po yis ni
T02D1909:42b-21: gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa bskyed pa'i
T02D1909:42b-23: de dag ni rdo rje 'dzin pa de gzugs la sogs pa ni skye ba med cing /
T02D1909:42b-24: phyi nang gi gzugs dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir rigs pa ma yin no //
T02D1909:42b-25: sems can rnams gzung pa'i don du yang nyid kyi
T02D1909:42b-26: sku bud med du sprul nas gtso bo mnyes par
T02D1909:42b-27: bya ba'i phyir sku las byung ba ni de nas
T02D1909:42b-28: zhes pa la sogs pas gsungs so //
T02D1909:42b-29: de dag ni go sla bas so //
T02D1909:42b-30: de la la la ni sangs rgyas spyan lta bu
T02D1909:42b-31: zhes bya ba ni de la sangs rgyas ni rnam
T02D1909:42b-32: par snang mdzad ces pa'i don du shes par bya'o
T02D1909:42b-33: ; / de yang rang rang gi mdog dang ldan pa rnams te /
T02D1909:42b-34: la la spyan lta bu la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1909:42b-35: la la ni m'a ma k'i la sogs pa rang
T02D1909:42b-36: rang gi rigs dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs dang
T02D1909:42b-37: / la la ni gos dkar mo lta bu mdog dmar mo dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1909:42b-38: la la sgrol ma lta bu mdog ser mo dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1909:42b-39: la la ni reg gi ngo bo lta bu rang gi mdog ljang gu dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1909:42b-40: de dag la sogs pa rang rang gi gzugs dang
T02D1909:42b-41: mdog la sogs pa ji ltar sbyor ba lta bur
T02D1909:42b-42: phyung ste gnas pa dang 'jug par bya'o zhes 'grub
T02D1909:43a-0: po // de yang 'di skad du le'u bco brgyad @43a * //
T02D1909:43a-2: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D1909:43a-3: ye shes 'khor lo'i kun bsdus nas //
T02D1909:43a-4: bud med rnam dgu sprul nas kyang //
T02D1909:43a-5: bsgrub bya'i lus la dgod par bya //
T02D1909:43a-7: da ni rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i phyir gdul
T02D1909:43a-8: bya rnams kyi don du de nas de bzhin gshegs
T02D1909:43a-9: pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:43a-10: de la bha ga ni sa bon gyi gnas yin pa'i phyir na /
T02D1909:43a-11: de dag gi bzhugs gnas te bud med kyi bha ga nyid do //
T02D1909:43a-13: gcig la du mar mngon no //
T02D1909:43a-14: gong du rgyal ba rnams bzhugs ba rang gi sgo
T02D1909:43a-15: rnam byas nas byang chub kyi sems zla ba lta
T02D1909:43a-16: bu gnas nas phyung ba ni dam tshig chen po
T02D1909:43a-17: ste dkyil 'khor ni de las gyur pa'o //
T02D1909:43a-18: mnyam pa dang khyab pa dang rgyas pa'i phyir na
T02D1909:43a-19: gru bzhi ste gsal ba yang de'i ngo bo nyid
T02D1909:43a-20: kyang de bas gsal ba'i ngo bo ste /
T02D1909:43a-21: rten nyid sgrib pa med cing ye shes kyis thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:43a-22: mdzes pa'i kha dog la sogs pa dang ldan pa ni kho na nyid thob pa'i phyir na /
T02D1909:43a-23: sna tshogs gzugs kyis kun du khyab //
T02D1909:43a-24: ces pa ste til 'bru bzhin du'o //
T02D1909:43a-25: de bzhin du 'og tu yang sbyar ro //
T02D1909:43a-26: de kho na'i 'od zer dgag pa dang gtong pa
T02D1909:43a-27: dang gnyig ma yin pa rgyun 'bab chu bo bzhin
T02D1909:43a-28: du gnas pa nyid kyi phyir 'od zer 'phro ba
T02D1909:43a-29: mang po 'khrug pa ste gsal ba ni zla ba
T02D1909:43a-30: ste / nyi ma dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir na sogs pa smos so //
T02D1909:43a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas ni chos kyi
T02D1909:43a-32: dbyings te thams cad kyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin
T02D1909:43a-33: pa gnas so // ting nge 'dzin las byung ba'i
T02D1909:43a-34: dkyil 'khor 'di bskyed pa'i rim pa las 'ongs pa
T02D1909:43a-36: phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa las bskyed pa ltar
T02D1909:43a-37: snang ba dang po'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba'i
T02D1909:43a-38: mos pa'i dbang las grub pa bstan to //
T02D1909:43a-39: las dang po pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis kyang /
T02D1909:43a-40: rang gi nye bar len pa'i rkyen sa bon 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di bsam par bya'o //
T02D1909:43a-42: las dang po ba'i rnal 'byor pas de bzhin gshegs
T02D1909:43a-43: pa thams cad la dang por gzugs kyi rdo rje
T02D1909:43a-44: ma la sogs pa dam pa'i mchod pa brtsams nas
T02D1909:43b-0: / de la rgyal ba rnams @43b rjes su chags par bya ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1909:43b-1: ma 'ongs pa rgyu nas grol bar bya ba'i don
T02D1909:43b-2: du dbyings kyi nang gi gzhal yas khang brtsegs pa'i
T02D1909:43b-3: dbus na / lha'i ngo bo nyid tsam snang ba'i
T02D1909:43b-4: sa bon de ni nye bar len pa'i rkyen yin
T02D1909:43b-6: ye shes 'ga' zhig dbang du byas pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1909:43b-7: pas ni rgyu'i mtshams kyi nges pa'i dbang gis nye
T02D1909:43b-8: bar len pa'i rkyen de nyid sngon du byas par
T02D1909:43b-9: rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1909:43b-11: ye shes rnams dbang thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas ni
T02D1909:43b-12: sa bon de'i mthu las rgyu dang rgyu can du
T02D1909:43b-13: snang ba shin tu chags pa goms pa'i dbang du
T02D1909:43b-14: byas nas / sa bon las yig 'bru gsum sbyar nas /
T02D1909:43b-15: don dang sems la dgag pa dang gtong ba byas te /
T02D1909:43b-16: skur bsgom ba la brten pa yin no //
T02D1909:43b-17: ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas ni
T02D1909:43b-18: sa bon de'i mthu las a'a li k'a li goms
T02D1909:43b-20: 'khor lo'i rgyun shin tu phra ba las ma gtogs
T02D1909:43b-21: pa spangs te bsgoms nas don bya ba yin te
T02D1909:43b-22: / skad cig ma re re'i sbyor ba la brten pa brtags pa ste /
T02D1909:43b-23: de bzhi ni mtshams sbrel ba'o //
T02D1909:43b-24: ha cang spros pa mi dgos kyi gtang ngo //
T02D1909:43b-25: da ni slob ma rnams gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du
T02D1909:43b-26: 'jug cing dbang bskur ba'i don tsam gsungs pa ni
T02D1909:43b-27: / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa rnams kyis bstan to //
T02D1909:43b-28: bdag po de zhes pa ni rig ma dang bcas
T02D1909:43b-29: pa'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig chen po nyid rnam
T02D1909:43b-30: par gnas so ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1909:43b-31: des ni slob ma rnams kyang gzhug pa'i las su rig par bya'o //
T02D1909:43b-32: 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs pa'i sgo nas zhus pa'ang de nyid do //
T02D1909:43b-33: de nas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis ni dbang bskur ba'i don bstan to //
T02D1909:43b-34: de la de dag gi don ni go sla bas so //
T02D1909:43b-35: zhugs pa ni de ma thag pa'i rim pas h'um
T02D1909:43b-36: dang rdo rje la sogs pa ni thugs te de
T02D1909:43b-37: kho na la'o // dbang bskur ba ni tha ma'i don la shes par bya'o //
T02D1909:43b-38: da ni sku gsal bar bstan pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo
T02D1909:43b-39: bo thams cad kyi bdag nyid du de rnams gcig
T02D1909:43b-40: par gyur pa ni tshig gi don ni gnyis kyis
T02D1909:43b-41: ston te / de la byang chub kyi sems rdo
T02D1909:43b-42: rje ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dang dbang
T02D1909:44a-0: phyug la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i @44a * //
T02D1909:44a-2: mi rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid brda 'am tha snyad
T02D1909:44a-3: dang bral ba'i don la rtse gcig pa gang gis
T02D1909:44a-4: byed pa de'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1909:44a-5: rdo rje ni de dang ldan pa'i don te de la zhugs so //
T02D1909:44a-6: zhugs ma thag tu de'i stobs kyis ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1909:44a-7: thams cad kyi bdag nyid dang /
T02D1909:44a-8: nam mkha'i dbyings 'di mnyam par gyur pa'i don to //
T02D1909:44a-9: de'i yon tan ni de nas zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:44a-10: de la de nas ni byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur ba'i de ma thag go //
T02D1909:44a-11: bud med kyi chos dbyings kyi nang na gzhal med khang brtsegs pa'i dbus na gnas pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:44a-12: nam mkha'i dbyings na gnas pa smos so //
T02D1909:44a-13: byin gyis brlabs ni glo bur gyi dbang gis ni
T02D1909:44a-14: ma yin gyi de kho na nyid kyi rjes su
T02D1909:44a-15: zhugs pa'i dbang sngon du thob pas lus ngag bde
T02D1909:44a-16: ba dang yid bde ba thob par gyur to zhes
T02D1909:44a-17: so / de lta ma yin na thar pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro ;
T02D1909:44a-19: bcu drug cha shas sde pa las byung gang ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus //
T02D1909:44a-20: zhes pa'i nges pa gsungs so //
T02D1909:44a-21: sgra yi ge dang yig 'bru las gyur pa'i zla
T02D1909:44a-22: ba rnam pa gnyis zhu ba'i ngo bo 'dir bstan
T02D1909:44a-23: pa med kyang stong pa nyid dang snying rjes phye
T02D1909:44a-24: ba'i byang chub sems kyi ngo bo rdo rje 'dzin
T02D1909:44a-25: pa'o // de dag gi don brtags pa'i skabs dbye'o //
T02D1909:44a-26: a'a:la sogs pa rnams kyis stong pa nyid kyi che ba bstan pa yin no //
T02D1909:44a-27: de dngos po rnams so sor 'gog pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:44a-28: des na brgyud pa'i rim pas rgyu'i dngos po bstan
T02D1909:44a-29: pa la gzhan dag ni zlog ba'i sgo nas ston
T02D1909:44a-30: te / aa yig la sogs pa'i sngon du rang
T02D1909:44a-31: bzhin stong pa nyid kyis de rnams gsal ba ni
T02D1909:44a-32: des dngos po rnams rab tu 'gog pa'i thabs kyi
T02D1909:44a-33: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyu yin te /
T02D1909:44a-34: gzhan dag gi zla ba brtsigs par byas pa rang
T02D1909:44a-35: bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi rkyen du mi nus
T02D1909:44a-36: pas na ka la sogs par snang ba ni de
T02D1909:44a-37: las gyur pa'i zla ba gnyis pa'i rgyu yin no
T02D1909:44a-38: // byang chub kyi sems snying rje'i bdag nyid de ltar ro //
T02D1909:44a-39: de ltar na de'i stobs kyis 'khor lor gsang ba'i
T02D1909:44a-40: bdag nyid kyis sems can gyi don bya ba yin
T02D1909:44b-0: te / don gzhan mthong ba med pa'i phyir na 'di nyid mthong @44b par mngon no //
T02D1909:44b-1: aa dang ka la sogs pa gsal ba las byung
T02D1909:44b-2: ba zla ba gnyis las gzhan du gyur pa'i rnam
T02D1909:44b-3: pa ni tshig gsum gyis bstan te /
T02D1909:44b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:44b-5: de nas ni zla ba gnyis kyi de ma thag go //
T02D1909:44b-6: sku gsung thugs rdo rje ni /
T02D1909:44b-7: ye shes kyi ngo bor mi phyed pa'i phyir na'o //
T02D1909:44b-8: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid de kun gyis 'da' bar
T02D1909:44b-9: dka' ba'i mnyam pa nyid de las 'byung ba'i ting
T02D1909:44b-11: brtags pa'i dngos po la sems rtse gcig pa nyid do //
T02D1909:44b-12: des ni gong gi don rig pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:44b-13: skyes bu'i gzugs kyang de chen po yang de nyid pas de skad ces bya ste /
T02D1909:44b-14: rig pa ni rgyud dang las dang lta ba'i rig pa ste /
T02D1909:44b-16: de nyid kyi phyir na sngags kyi bdag po'ang de kho na'o //
T02D1909:44b-17: des na byin gyis brlabs so zhes te /
T02D1909:44b-18: de de rnams kyi rkyen no //
T02D1909:44b-19: byin gyis brlabs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das gong
T02D1909:44b-20: du snyoms par zhugs pa de nyid rdo rje gsum
T02D1909:44b-21: dang ldan pa'i phyir zhal gsum pa lta bu ni
T02D1909:44b-22: dbus dang g-yas g-yon nag po dang dkar po dang
T02D1909:44b-23: dmar po rnams rim bzhin no //
T02D1909:44b-24: de lta bur kun gyis gzigs par gyur to zhes so //
T02D1909:44b-25: las dang po pas sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
T02D1909:44b-26: rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes brnyes kyi bar du
T02D1909:44b-27: thabs kyi rim pa grangs med pas ngo bo nyid
T02D1909:44b-29: de'i byin rlabs las thun mong du thun mong ba
T02D1909:44b-30: des gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis 'od kyi 'du 'phro
T02D1909:44b-31: ltar byung ste / thams cad du bsam pa'i dbang gis snang bar gyur to //
T02D1909:44b-32: khyad par du mngon par byang chub pa'i sku lta
T02D1909:44b-33: bu thun mong ma yin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
T02D1909:44b-34: sku de chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi dkyil na sa
T02D1909:44b-35: bon gyi tshul du bzhugs pa yin te /
T02D1909:44b-36: des snod du rung zhing dbang bskur ba dang rgyu nas sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:44b-37: de nyid 'og min du longs spyod chen po'i skus
T02D1909:44b-38: 'khor rnams thugs ka nas byung ste ched du brjod
T02D1909:44b-39: pa gsungs pa'o // de rnams ni mtshams 'brel pa'o //
T02D1909:44b-40: de yan chad du dang po'i las kyi rim pa gsungs nas /
T02D1909:44b-41: da ni gleng bslang ba gsungs te /
T02D1909:44b-42: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa smos so //
T02D1909:44b-43: de la de nas ni gzigs par gyur pa'i de ma thag go //
T02D1909:45a-0: @45a * // sems can mi bskyod pa'i rgyu can te /
T02D1909:45a-1: des sa bon gyis bskyed pas 'dir mi bskyod pa gzung ngo //
T02D1909:45a-2: gzhan dag la yang brjod par bya ste /
T02D1909:45a-3: de rnams gzhan gyi mthu las byung ba ni ma yin no //
T02D1909:45a-4: sogs pa smos pa ni gtso bo la gnag ldan
T02D1909:45a-5: pa de thams cad la de dang de ltar ro
T02D1909:45a-6: // 'og gi don brjod pa ni phyung bas so //
T02D1909:45a-9: des ni ae ma ho zhes pa ni dam zhing ngo mtshar te /
T02D1909:45a-12: bsam pa'i dbang gis gzugs sna tshogs par rab tu byung ba'o //
T02D1909:45a-13: thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir sbas te gsang ba'o //
T02D1909:45a-15: mi rtogs gnas med pa'o zhes pa /
T02D1909:45a-16: rigs pa ma yin pa'i dpag pa dang /
T02D1909:45a-17: mngon sum pas rtogs par dka' bas so //
T02D1909:45a-18: de dag ni skal ba dang ldan pa ma yin pas so //
T02D1909:45a-19: de ni skal ba dang ldan pa'i dbang du byas te zhu ba sngon du gtong ba'i don to //
T02D1909:45a-23: de dag ni de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa rnams kyis bstan to //
T02D1909:45a-24: gcig tu 'dus nas zhes pa tshul dang dgongs pa gcig tu gyur pa rnams so //
T02D1909:45a-25: nang gi gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa lha mo rnams ni chags par bya ba ste /
T02D1909:45a-26: de nyid thams cad khyab pa ni mchod pa rgyas pa de kho na nyid yin la /
T02D1909:45a-27: dam tshig ni rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1909:45a-28: de'i sprin gyis mchod de phyag 'tshal nas gsol to zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D1909:45a-29: da ni skye ba'i rim pa dang /
T02D1909:45a-31: 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs pa'i sgo nas zhus pa dag ni /
T02D1909:45a-32: tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:45a-33: 'dus pa gsang ba las byung ba //
T02D1909:45a-34: zhes pa la sogs pa smos so //
T02D1909:45a-35: de la 'dus pa ni 'du ba yin te /
T02D1909:45a-36: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i sa bon te /
T02D1909:45a-37: sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid las byung ba'i phyir na /
T02D1909:45a-39: byung ba ni gong gi sa bon no //
T02D1909:45a-40: de ni zhus pa dang po'o //
T02D1909:45a-41: sa bon las sngags 'byin pa de'i don de bzhin
T02D1909:45a-42: gshegs pa rnams kyi do rje snying po bsdus pa'o
T02D1909:45a-43: // gsang ba ni thun mong ma yin pa ste ltag 'og tu sbyar ro //
T02D1909:45b-0: nyid bcom ldan 'das zhes pa @45b ni 'dir sku
T02D1909:45b-1: lnga'i bdag nyid sa bon las rim gyis gyur pa
T02D1909:45b-3: de ltar zhus pa la dor ba'i tshul du bshad pa gnang ba'i phyir /
T02D1909:45b-4: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa smos so //
T02D1909:45b-5: 'di ni thams cad kyang the tshom skye bar byed pa yin na zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1909:45b-6: yang dag pa'i de kho na nyid sa 'og ma pa rnams kyis mi rtogs pa'i phyir te /
T02D1909:45b-7: gong ma gong ma'i blo'i khyad par gyis sa 'og ma rnams su 'byin zhe'o //
T02D1909:45b-8: gzhan rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba la /
T02D1909:45b-9: de kho na nyid zab pa'i phyir gzhan rnams te /
T02D1909:45b-10: byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02D1909:45b-12: dpe med pa rnams the tshom skye ba'i rgyu 'di yin no //
T02D1909:45b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang re zhig chos nyid
T02D1909:45b-15: zab mo med par the tshom skye bar byed pa
T02D1909:45b-16: yin na / sgrub pa po gzhan lta ci smos zhes bshad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1909:45b-17: de kho na nyid nyan pa'i skal pa dang ldan par mdzod cig ces bskul ba'i phyir /
T02D1909:45b-18: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1909:45b-19: de la ngo mtshar du gyur pa dang rmad du gyur pa ni ya mtshan che ba dang /
T02D1909:45b-20: sngon med pa myong ba dang /
T02D1909:45b-22: de rnams ni rim bzhin du sbyar ro //
T02D1909:45b-23: de ni 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa dang 'brel to /
T02D1909:45b-24: khyad par du gyur pa ni de kho na nyid rig pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:45b-25: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni la dor ba'i don te /
T02D1909:45b-26: skal pa dang ldan par ma byas nas /
T02D1909:45b-27: mngon par shes pa mi 'thob pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1909:45b-28: rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba ni thams cad
T02D1909:45b-29: kyi bdag nyid kyi rdo rje lam nas phyung ba
T02D1909:45b-30: sa bon te / bud med kyi bha ga'i nang na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor la mchod pa dang /
T02D1909:45b-31: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i tshig rnams kyi nyan pa po rnams thog mar bde ba dang /
T02D1909:45b-32: yid bde ba myong bar bgyi ba nas tha mar
T02D1909:45b-33: mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i
T02D1909:45b-34: bar du bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa'o //
T02D1909:45b-35: 'dir rnam par bkod pa rnams ni don nges pa
T02D1909:45b-36: med pa'i phyir dang po kho nar 'dod chags chen
T02D1909:45b-37: po'i tshul zhes bya ba gcig pu yin te gzhan
T02D1909:46a-0: de'i phyir gleng gzhi sngon du byas pa'i @46a * //
T02D1909:46a-1: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
T02D1909:46a-2: bzhugs so zhes pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar tshig bzhi
T02D1909:46a-3: pas ni zhus pa'i tshig gnyis pa la gtogs pas
T02D1909:46a-4: / slob ma rnams skal ba thob pa'i mtshan ma /
T02D1909:46a-5: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i sprul pa'i don du /
T02D1909:46a-6: thabs dang shes rab dga' bar bya ba gsungs so //
T02D1909:46a-7: de'i 'og tu de nas zhes pa nas gnas par
T02D1909:46a-8: gyur to zhes pa'i bar tshig gnyis kyis ni zhu
T02D1909:46a-10: byang chub ba rnam pa lnga dang 'brel pa gsungs so //
T02D1909:46a-11: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig gcig gis ni tshig bzhi'i dang po dang 'brel pa'o //
T02D1909:46a-12: bzhi pa nyid dang 'brel ba ni tshig gcig gis ston te /
T02D1909:46a-13: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:46a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa nas /
T02D1909:46a-15: gnas med pa'o zhes pa'i bar tshig gsum gyis ni
T02D1909:46a-16: a'a:yig la sogs pa las gyur ba zla ba gnyis
T02D1909:46a-17: pa las gzhan du gyur pa'i rnam pa gsungs so
T02D1909:46a-18: // de nas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa nas /
T02D1909:46a-19: bstan du gsol zhes pa'i bar sa bon dang phyag
T02D1909:46a-20: mtshan gyi rim pas 'khor lor gyur pa la sogs
T02D1909:46a-21: pa gsungs so // drug pa de'i 'og tu bdun
T02D1909:46a-22: pa gsungs pa ni dkyil 'khor rnams dbyung pa'i phyir
T02D1909:46a-23: pa gsungs so // / de nas bcom ldan 'das
T02D1909:46a-24: zhes pa la sogs pa mtha'i bar du gsungs so
T02D1909:46a-25: pa gsungs so // / // de rnams ni bsdus pa'i don te /
T02D1909:46a-27: de la dkyil 'khor gyi don 'di nyid rnams te /
T02D1909:46a-28: gong gis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas /
T02D1909:46a-30: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes de nyid gsal zhing dbyer med pa'i phyir rdo rje ste /
T02D1909:46a-31: dpe de nyid kyis bshad do //
T02D1909:46a-32: de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te zhe'o //
T02D1909:46a-33: zhe sdang zhes pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa ste /
T02D1909:46a-34: de la 'jig rten ni sems can dang sems can ma yin pa la zhe sdang ba ste /
T02D1909:46a-36: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs te /
T02D1909:46a-37: kun brtags kyi mtshan nyid la zhe sdang ba'o //
T02D1909:46a-38: de ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyu'o //
T02D1909:46a-39: rigs ni rgyun ma chad pa yin te /
T02D1909:46a-40: bstan pa'i bdag nyid du gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:46b-0: mchog gi snying po zhes pa @46b thams cad kyi dam pa yin pa dang /
T02D1909:46b-1: mi g-yo ba'i phyir na zhes so //
T02D1909:46b-2: 'bras bu rab tu 'byin pa'i phyir snying po ste /
T02D1909:46b-3: 'di zhes pa 'og ma la snyegs pa'o //
T02D1909:46b-4: rigs la sogs pa de dag ni gzhan du yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1909:46b-5: 'dul ba'i dbang gis rdo rje ltar yin gyis kyang /
T02D1909:46b-6: rnam par bsgyur ba'i don du rdo rje las zhes te /
T02D1909:46b-8: badzra dhrik ces pa le'u bco brgyad pa las /
T02D1909:46b-9: rgyu lnga dag gi 'bras dag ni //
T02D1909:46b-10: rdo rje zhes su bstan pa yin //
T02D1909:46b-11: gzungs zhes bya ba 'dzin par bshad //
T02D1909:46b-12: rnam shes rdo rje 'dzin par bzlas //
T02D1909:46b-16: / des rdo rje rtse lnga ni sangs rgyas lnga'i bdag nyid dang /
T02D1909:46b-17: ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid gong 'og gi rtse'i tshul
T02D1909:46b-18: gyis rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'i ngo
T02D1909:46b-19: bo rdo rje badzra zhes gsungs so //
T02D1909:46b-20: de 'dzin pas na badzra dhrik ces te /
T02D1909:46b-21: rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam shes zhe'o ;
T02D1909:46b-24: de nas phyung ma thag tu zhes pa la sogs pa smos so //
T02D1909:46b-25: rigs pa'i shes pa rig ma las byung bas so //
T02D1909:46b-26: mi bskyod pa rang gi rig ma dang ldan pas na /
T02D1909:46b-27: phyag rgya chen por sbyor zhes so //
T02D1909:46b-28: nag po zhes pa dbus kyi zhal dang sku'o //
T02D1909:46b-29: dkar po dmar po ni g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal lo //
T02D1909:46b-30: de lta bu'i tshul du rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku gsung thugs la zhugs pa ste /
T02D1909:46b-31: thim zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1909:46b-32: dam tshig 'byung ba zhes pa me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
T02D1909:46b-35: / gti mug ces bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1909:46b-37: de la 'jig rten gyi ni mi shes pa'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D1909:46b-40: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni de dang mi mthun pa'i grogs te /
T02D1909:46b-41: 'byed pa med pa'i gti mug chen po ste /
T02D1909:46b-42: de ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyu'o //
T02D1909:46b-43: rigs la sogs pa ni sngon du byas so //
T02D1909:46b-44: dzi na dzika ces pa de nyid las /
T02D1909:46b-45: yod med dbus las 'das pa'i lam //
T02D1909:46b-46: zhes pa la sogs pa tshig bzhi gsungs te /
T02D1909:46b-47: de la yod pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
T02D1909:47a-1: gyur ba'i rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo de nyid gzugs zhes bya ste /
T02D1909:47a-2: sems can rnams kyi kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa de 'dir dzi na dzi ka ces gsungs so //
T02D1909:47a-3: dzi na'i sgra kho na'i don yang gsungs ba'o //
T02D1909:47a-4: skyes pa zhes pa dzi na'i sgra ste /
T02D1909:47a-6: de las rgyal bar byed pas na dzi na dzika ces te /
T02D1909:47a-7: kun brtags kyi bdag nyid kyis mi skye zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1909:47a-9: phyung ma thag tu zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:47a-10: bzhugs so zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D1909:47a-11: de la dkar po nag po dmar po ni dbus dang g-yas g-yon gyi zhal rim pa bzhin no //
T02D1909:47a-12: gzhan dag na sngon du byas so //
T02D1909:47a-13: rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni mnyam
T02D1909:47a-14: pa nyid kyi ye shes des kun 'byung zhing mi
T02D1909:47a-15: phyed pa'i phyir na rdo rje ste kun la snyoms
T02D1909:47a-16: par zhugs te phyung ngo zhes pa dang 'brel to
T02D1909:47a-18: nor bu yid bzhin zhes pa nga rgyal gyis 'gugs pa ste /
T02D1909:47a-21: de la 'di'i ni sems khengs pa ste /
T02D1909:47a-22: rnam pa bdun gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1909:47a-23: pha rol gyi ni don la sran 'dzugs pa ste /
T02D1909:47a-24: don nyid las byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:47a-25: de ni dkon mchog dpal gyi rgyu'o //
T02D1909:47a-27: thams cad don kun 'byung bas na ;
T02D1909:47a-28: / zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1909:47a-29: de la don thams cad la gang mnyam pa nyid
T02D1909:47a-30: de las byung ba des rnam par dag pas na
T02D1909:47a-32: de yang tshor bas rang gi yang dag par rig pas /
T02D1909:47a-33: nges par tshor bas rnam par dag pa'i yid ni ratna dhrik ces gsungs so //
T02D1909:47a-34: de'i sku dang g-yas g-yon gyi zhal ni ser po
T02D1909:47a-35: dang dkar po dang nag po'i tshul du rim pa
T02D1909:47a-37: 'dod chags chen po zhes bya ba ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes te /
T02D1909:47a-38: ris med pa nyid kyi phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1909:47a-39: don bskyed pa dang de nyid mi phyed pa'i phyir 'byung ba rdo rje ste /
T02D1909:47a-40: de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i ngo bo de la
T02D1909:47a-41: snyoms par zhugs te phyung ngo zhes pa dang 'brel
T02D1909:47a-42: to // de la 'dod chags ni gnyis te /
T02D1909:47a-43: de 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
T02D1909:47a-44: de la 'jig rten gyi ni nye bar len pa'i
T02D1909:47a-45: phung po la zhen pa dang lhag par chags pa'o
T02D1909:47b-0: // 'jig rten las 'das pa ni de dang mi @47b mthun pa'i phyogs te /
T02D1909:47b-1: chags tsam nyid na chags pa med pa'i 'dod chags chen po ste /
T02D1909:47b-2: de ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi rgyu'o //
T02D1909:47b-3: rigs la sogs pa sngon du byas so //
T02D1909:47b-4: aa ro lika ces pa lung las //
T02D1909:47b-5: 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid mtshan pa dang //
T02D1909:47b-6: zhes pa la sogs pa tshigs bcad gsungs te /
T02D1909:47b-7: da la mtshan nyid ni nag po dang ser po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1909:47b-8: de rtogs pa'i ngo bo mig la sogs pa lnga dang /
T02D1909:47b-9: yid dang drug rnam par rtog pa'i yid do //
T02D1909:47b-10: des thams cad du gang brtsan pa thams cad kyi
T02D1909:47b-11: don so sor kun du rnam par rtog pa de
T02D1909:47b-12: rnam par dag pa kho na gang gong nas gsungs
T02D1909:47b-14: mtshon pa de'i aa ro lika bshad ce'o //
T02D1909:47b-15: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ni yon tan gyi ngo bor bstan to //
T02D1909:47b-16: 'jig rten pa'i don so sor kun du rtogs nas
T02D1909:47b-17: spyan ras kyis 'tsho ba de la dbang bsgyur ba'i
T02D1909:47b-18: phyir / de skad ces bya ste rdo rje chos so //
T02D1909:47b-19: sbyor ba ni gang gi rnam par bzhugs pa rig ma dang ldan pas na'o ;
T02D1909:47b-20: / sku dang g-yas g-yon gyi zhal ni dmar po dkar po nag po'i rim pas so //
T02D1909:47b-21: de ni nub tu bzhugs so //
T02D1909:47b-22: las kyi rigs bstan pa'i phyir gdon mi za ba ni thogs pa med pa'o //
T02D1909:47b-23: de ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so //
T02D1909:47b-24: de nyid dbyer med pa ste /
T02D1909:47b-25: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang gyur pa
T02D1909:47b-26: de la snyoms bar zhugs te phyung ngo zhes pa
T02D1909:47b-28: de la dam tshig dgug pa ni phrag dog gi ste /
T02D1909:47b-31: de la 'di'i ni gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la sems khong nas 'khrug pa'o //
T02D1909:47b-32: pha rol gyi ni de dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs te /
T02D1909:47b-33: de ni gnyis su med pa'i don yin te /
T02D1909:47b-34: snying rje chen po las byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:47b-35: de ni tshe dpag med kyi rgyu'o //
T02D1909:47b-36: rigs la sogs pa rnams ni sngon du brjod pa bzhin no //
T02D1909:47b-37: pradzny'a dhrika ces pa rnam shes rab tu gsal byed pa la sogs pa'i tshig rnams gsungs te /
T02D1909:47b-38: byams pa dang snying rje la sogs pa rnam par
T02D1909:47b-39: goms pa'i rab tu gsal bas byed pa'i rnam par
T02D1909:47b-40: shes pa gang bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes
T02D1909:47b-41: kyi ngo bo de shes rab ces su bshad /
T02D1909:47b-42: de 'dzin pas na 'du byed kyi sems kyi rnam
T02D1909:47b-43: par dag pa'i sems ni de skad ces gsungs so
T02D1909:47b-45: de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:48a-3: tshul du zhes pa yang de dang de ltar ro //
T02D1909:48a-4: gzhan dag ni gong bzhin no //
T02D1909:48a-5: de nyid kho na'i rig ma dang ldan pas na sbyor ba'i zhes so //
T02D1909:48a-6: zhal dbus dang g-yas g-yon gyi zhal ni ljang gu
T02D1909:48a-7: dang dkar po dang nag po ni gong ma bzhin
T02D1909:48a-9: da ni mjug bsdu ba gsungs pa ni zhe sdang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:48a-10: 'dir nyon mongs pa lnga'i rigs la sogs pa 'dod pa yin te /
T02D1909:48a-11: grol ba zhes pa de rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:48a-12: 'dod pa yang de ste sgrub pa ni thabs te gnyi ga la snyeg go //
T02D1909:48a-13: de dag gi don ni 'di skad du /
T02D1909:48a-14: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can dang /
T02D1909:48a-15: rigs ldan ma gtogs pa 'di rnams kyis /
T02D1909:48a-16: zhe sdang la sogs pa'i dngos po de dang de
T02D1909:48a-17: las gyur pa don nyid kyis 'grub par byed do
T02D1909:48a-19: lha mo rnams dbyung ba bstan pa'i phyir de nas yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:48a-20: de la rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid mnyes pa'i dam tshig ni m'a ma k'is so //
T02D1909:48a-21: de la bzhugs te phyung ngo zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D1909:48a-22: dve sha ra ti ni de la phan tshun thug pa ni /
T02D1909:48a-23: zhe sdang zhes ni bstan pa yin //
T02D1909:48a-25: gang phan tshun thug pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bor /
T02D1909:48a-29: dbang bskur ba'i dus su m'a ma k'i bsgoms nas rdo rje dang padmor thug pa ni dvesha'o //
T02D1909:48a-30: de las gyur pa gsungs pa ni de nas de zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:48a-31: bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa ni mi bskyod pa nyid de /
T02D1909:48a-32: mkha'i nang gi grva gang la m'a ma k'i la sogs pa gnas pa'i grva rnams te /
T02D1909:48a-33: 'di ni me mtshams kho na ste /
T02D1909:48a-34: de la gnas so ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1909:48a-35: spyan ma bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:48a-36: de la mnyes par byed pa zhes pa ni spyan ma ste /
T02D1909:48a-38: rnam par snang mdzad de nyid la'o //
T02D1909:48a-39: gzhan dag ni sngon du byas pa ste /
T02D1909:48a-40: go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02D1909:48a-41: mo ha ra ti zhes pa /
T02D1909:48a-42: gnyis med chos kyi ye shes la //
T02D1909:48a-43: phyi rol nga rgyal rmongs zhes pa //
T02D1909:48a-45: chos nyid kyis gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D1909:48a-46: ngo bo rnams la gang nga rgyal gyi ngo bo
T02D1909:48a-47: nyid du rmongs pa de gti mug phyogs med pa
T02D1909:48a-48: ni mo ha zhes gsungs so //
T02D1909:48b-0: @48b rnam pa gcig tu dbang bskur ba'i dus su /
T02D1909:48b-1: tshigs su bcad pa dang mthun par spyan ma bsgoms nas /
T02D1909:48b-2: rig ma 'khyud pa la sogs pa bsgoms na mo ha zhe'o //
T02D1909:48b-3: lho'i grva zhes pa ni bden bral gyi'o //
T02D1909:48b-4: gos dkar mo gsungs pa ni de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:48b-5: de la chags par byed pa ni gos dkar mo ste /
T02D1909:48b-6: snang ba mtha' yas nyid la de de dang 'dra bas so //
T02D1909:48b-7: gzhan la'ang de bzhin sbyar ro //
T02D1909:48b-9: mtshan nyid 'dod chags kun zhen pa //
T02D1909:48b-11: gang mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin gnyis su med
T02D1909:48b-12: pa'i bdag nyid de kho na 'dod chags de ni
T02D1909:48b-14: / rnam pa gcig tu na bde ba chen po'i
T02D1909:48b-15: mtshan nyid la chags nas zhal sbyor ba la sogs
T02D1909:48b-17: nub kyi grvar zhes ba rlung gi mtshams so //
T02D1909:48b-18: sgrol ma bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:48b-19: de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni gdon mi za bar grub pa'o //
T02D1909:48b-20: slu ba rdo rje zhes pa bdag po dang 'dra
T02D1909:48b-21: bas de nyid la chags par byed pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1909:48b-22: no // mi phyed pa'i phyir rdo rje ste /
T02D1909:48b-23: de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di byung ngo zhes 'brel to //
T02D1909:48b-24: 'di dag ni gong du snyegs so //
T02D1909:48b-28: de la gang de nyid dbyer med pa'i ngo bo ye shes de ni badzra zhes gsungs so //
T02D1909:48b-29: de bzhin la mtha' na ra ti'i sgra sbyor bar shes par bya'o //
T02D1909:48b-30: rnam pa gcig tu sgrol ma bsgoms nas /
T02D1909:48b-31: byang chub kyi bde ba rig pa ni rdo rje'o //
T02D1909:48b-32: de las gyur pa ni de phyung ma thag tu zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:48b-33: gyur te bzhugs so shes pa dang 'brel to ;
T02D1909:48b-34: / byang phyogs kyi grva zhes pa dbang ldan gyi mtshams so //
T02D1909:48b-35: btsun mo'i mchog phun sum tshogs pa ni /
T02D1909:48b-36: bud med bde mchog phun sum tshogs pa zhes ba ste /
T02D1909:48b-37: mo ha ra ti la sogs pa de dag kho
T02D1909:48b-38: na mchog gi bde ba'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir na
T02D1909:48b-40: de nyid phun sum tshogs par gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1909:48b-41: de dag gi don bshad pa ni mi dgos kyis btang ngo //
T02D1909:48b-42: de dag gi sngags rnams ni spyan drangs pa'i don te /
T02D1909:48b-43: de'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi lha nyid du mngon no //
T02D1909:48b-44: de dag gi khro bo rnams dbyung ba gsungs pa /
T02D1909:48b-45: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:49a-1: lo zhes pa sa bon las gyur pa ste /
T02D1909:49a-2: de ltar gang gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas byung ngo zhes so //
T02D1909:49a-3: de'i dkyil 'khor ni sku'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1909:49a-4: rnam par snang mdzad du mngon no //
T02D1909:49a-5: khro bo zhes pa ni ngang gis dang shugs kyis
T02D1909:49a-6: khro ba dang kho bor bcos ba dang bcas pa
T02D1909:49a-7: ste / rig ma dang ldan pa las gyur pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:49a-8: de nyid byin gyis rlob pa'i zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D1909:49a-9: de bzhin sbyar te gzhan dag ni go sla bas so //
T02D1909:49a-11: rnam par mi 'jig bdag nyid chos //
T02D1909:49a-12: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig bzhi gsungs te /
T02D1909:49a-13: lus tshor ba sems dang chos rnams kyi du ma
T02D1909:49a-14: med pa la sogs pa'i yul rang gi ngo bo
T02D1909:49a-15: nyid kyis mi skye ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir
T02D1909:49a-16: na / rnam par mi 'jig bdag nyid chos //
T02D1909:49a-18: kun brtags pa'i bdag nyid kho na 'jig pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1909:49a-19: de yang dngos po kun zhes pa lus la sogs
T02D1909:49a-20: pa rnams kyi 'jig pa med pa'i dam tshig ste
T02D1909:49a-21: / lus la sogs pa la gtogs pa'i du ma
T02D1909:49a-22: med pa nyid las ji ltar sbyar bar bya ba'i
T02D1909:49a-23: yul la dad pa rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1909:49a-24: de ni ya m'anta krita do zhes gsungs so //
T02D1909:49a-25: de ci'i phyir phyin ci log pa ni gshin rje'o //
T02D1909:49a-26: de'i mthar phyin pa ni med pa zhes par mngon no//
T02D1909:49a-27: de las gyur pa ni phyung ma thag tu la sogs pa ste bzhugs so zhes so //
T02D1909:49a-28: bsnyengs par byed pa ni de kho na ste /
T02D1909:49a-29: sems can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:49a-30: de ni shar gyi sgor zhes so //
T02D1909:49a-31: rnam par rgyal ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:49a-32: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:49a-33: de la mngon par byang chub pa zhes pa ni
T02D1909:49a-34: rang gi rigs kyi gtso bo mi bskyod pa ste
T02D1909:49a-35: / de nyid dbyer med pas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la'o //
T02D1909:49a-36: de'i dkyil 'khor ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor te mi bskyod par mngon no //
T02D1909:49a-37: gzhan dag ni gong ma bzhin no //
T02D1909:49a-39: rnam par mi shes bdag nyid chos //
T02D1909:49a-40: zhes pa la sogs pa bzhi gsungs te /
T02D1909:49a-41: yi ge dam pas ngo bos rnam par dag pa
T02D1909:49a-42: nyid pas chos shin tu rgyas pa'i bdag nyid kyi
T02D1909:49a-43: 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1909:49a-44: de 'dra ba'i thams cad sems kyi dam tshig gang
T02D1909:49a-45: yin pa de ni pradzny'anta krita gtso zhes gsungs so
T02D1909:49b-0: // ci'i phyir 'byung ba'i skyon @49b med pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1909:49b-1: ma byung ba'i skyon mi skyed par byed pa dang /
T02D1909:49b-2: de ltar phan pa'i don ma skyes pa skyed par byed pa'i don dang /
T02D1909:49b-3: skyes pa gnas pa rnams la dad pa dang ldan pa gang /
T02D1909:49b-4: brtson 'grus rnam pa bzhi po des rnam par dag
T02D1909:49b-5: pa'i ngo bo rgyal ba kho nas shes rab mthar
T02D1909:49b-6: phyin zhes te / de 'dra ba'i shes rab kyi
T02D1909:49b-7: skyon kho na mthar phyin pa'i tha tshig gi phyir
T02D1909:49b-8: phyin zhes te / ro // de ni lho'i sgor zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1909:49b-9: rta mgrin bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:49b-10: chos zhes pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi tshul gyis zhugs zhes so //
T02D1909:49b-11: gang la zhe na mngon par shes pa la sogs
T02D1909:49b-12: pa'i yon tan rnams 'byung ba'i phyir rin po che
T02D1909:49b-14: dkyil 'khor ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1909:49b-15: snang ba mtha' yas yin pa nyid kyi phyir na 'dod chags 'chang ba'o //
T02D1909:49b-16: gzhan ni sngon du byas so //
T02D1909:49b-18: brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid chos zhes pa la sogs pa rnams gsungs te /
T02D1909:49b-19: don dam par de kho na nyid la gdags par
T02D1909:49b-20: mi nus pa'i phyir na tshogs thams cad brjod du
T02D1909:49b-21: med do // de nyid kyi phyir na ming dang
T02D1909:49b-22: gzugs blo zhes te ming la sogs par so sor
T02D1909:49b-23: snang ba'i blo yi ngo bo med de don dam
T02D1909:49b-24: par yul la ngo bo med do //
T02D1909:49b-25: de 'dra ba'i chos thams cad kyi dam tshig gang yin pa padm'anta krita gtso zhes so //
T02D1909:49b-26: ci'i phyir brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid kyi phung
T02D1909:49b-27: po'i yul la bdun pa dang brod pa la sogs
T02D1909:49b-28: pa dran pa brtson 'grus dang sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor
T02D1909:49b-29: pa gang yin pa de nyid don dam pa'i chos
T02D1909:49b-30: la mos pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa
T02D1909:49b-31: la sogs pa'i yul dran pa 'di padma'o //
T02D1909:49b-32: de nyid 'dun pa la sogs pa de dag gi
T02D1909:49b-33: skyon kho na mthar phyin par byed pas padm'anta krita
T02D1909:49b-34: ces so // de ni nub kyi skor zhe'o //
T02D1909:49b-35: da ni las thams cad pas gsungs pa de nas
T02D1909:49b-36: zhes yir byin gyis rlob pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1909:49b-37: / de la mi bskyod pa'i tshul gyis thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1909:49b-38: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes de nyid dbyer med
T02D1909:49b-39: pa'i rdo rje ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
T02D1909:49b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:49b-42: dkyil 'khor ni de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi'o //
T02D1909:50a-0: de byin gyis rlob pa ni gong ma nyid kyis @50a * //
T02D1909:50a-2: de rnams kyis rnal 'byor pa'i don du rang rang gi las dgug pa dang /
T02D1909:50a-5: bcing ba rnams so zhes so //
T02D1909:50a-6: bi ghanta krita ces pa ni /
T02D1909:50a-7: rnam par mi rtog bdag nyid chos //
T02D1909:50a-8: zhes pa la sogs pa'i shlo ka gcig gsungs te /
T02D1909:50a-9: rnam par mi rtog pa ni rang bzhin kho nas zhi ba nyid kyi phyir na /
T02D1909:50a-10: gzung ba la sogs pa'i rtog pa med pa /
T02D1909:50a-11: phung po lnga la sogs pa'i rdo rje kun gyi
T02D1909:50a-12: dam tshig mi 'da' ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa
T02D1909:50a-13: de'i ngo bor bgegs mthar phyin zhes so //
T02D1909:50a-14: ci'i phyir gong du gsungs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i chos rnams la /
T02D1909:50a-15: dran pa dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i rang gi sems rtse gcig pa'i ngo bo'i ting nge 'dzin /
T02D1909:50a-16: yang dag pa'i de kho na nyid dmigs pa'i shes
T02D1909:50a-17: rab kyi rgyur gyur pa gang yin pa des rnam
T02D1909:50a-18: par dag pa ngo bo tha mi dad pa la
T02D1909:50a-19: sogs pa'i bgegs mthar phyin par byed bas na bighn'a
T02D1909:50a-20: ntra krita gtso zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro ;
T02D1909:50a-21: / don de dag gi ha cang spros pa gzhag go //
T02D1909:50a-22: gzhan dag ni gong ma bzhin no //
T02D1909:50a-23: de ni byang gi sgro zhes pa yin no //
T02D1909:50a-24: de dag gi don ni 'di skad du brtson 'grus
T02D1909:50a-25: la sogs pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la
T02D1909:50a-26: sogs pa byas te de dag gis rang gi las
T02D1909:50a-27: su byed do // des rnam par dag pa 'dir bshad pa yin no //
T02D1909:50a-28: de bzhi ka dam tshig sems dpa'o zhes so //
T02D1909:50a-29: sku gsung thugs ni gsang ba ste rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1909:50a-31: shin tu grub par byed pa'i phyir byin gyis rlob pa la sogs pa smos so //
T02D1909:50a-32: le'u dang po'i dang po'i don ji snyed pa rdzogs so /
T02D1909:50a-34: // / da ni sbyor ba dang po dad dkyil 'khor dbyung ba gsungs nas /
T02D1909:50a-35: don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems thun mong dang
T02D1909:50a-36: khyad par gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs
T02D1909:50a-37: pa'o // de nas ni dkyil 'khor dbyung ba'i de ma thag go //
T02D1909:50a-38: sbyor pa ni mchod pa la sogs pa bya ste gsol to zhe'o //
T02D1909:50a-39: de'i dam tshig ni sku gsung thugs kyi mchog ces pa ste sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku /
T02D1909:50a-42: de dag gi rang bzhin yin pas kun gyi gsang ba ste /
T02D1909:50a-43: khyad par du gyur pa'i phyir mchog dang bla na med pa ste /
T02D1909:50a-44: byang chub kyi sems ni bdag nyid kyi ste /
T02D1909:50b-0: de kun gyi rgyu yin pa nyid kyi phyir @50b na snying po ste sa bon no //
T02D1909:50b-1: de nas ni zhus pa'i de ma thag go //
T02D1909:50b-2: yongs su rtog pa ni the tshom med par zhus pa rnams mkhyen pa ste /
T02D1909:50b-4: ji lta ba bzhin mkhyen pa dang /
T02D1909:50b-5: ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin la thugs kyis she'o //
T02D1909:50b-6: khyed kyis zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'o//
T02D1909:50b-7: sems lus lta bu dang zhes pa yul gyi rnam
T02D1909:50b-8: pa dang rang gi mtshan nyid med par gang du
T02D1909:50b-10: lus sems dbyer med par bstan pa'i phyir rtog pas bskyed pa'i lus kyang dgag pa ste /
T02D1909:50b-11: de'i phyir lus sems lta bu zhes smos so //
T02D1909:50b-13: sems tshig brjod pa lta bu ni gong 'og gi
T02D1909:50b-14: tshul gyis ngag yid tha mi dad par bya ba
T02D1909:50b-15: bstan pa ste / rtog pas bskyed pa dgag pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:50b-18: ngag dang yid ni 'dod pa dang gzugs med pa'i khams te rnam pa dang bcas pa yin la /
T02D1909:50b-19: de ni longs spyod dang sprul pa dang chos kyi
T02D1909:50b-20: rang bzhin gnyis su med par sbyar nas skyes cig
T02D1909:50b-21: pa ste / de ni re re la yang sbyar bar bstan pa yin no //
T02D1909:50b-22: zhu ba po rnams kyis bka' mnyan nas gsungs pa
T02D1909:50b-23: ni de nas zhes ba la sogs pa gsungs pa
T02D1909:50b-24: ste / de la gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
T02D1909:50b-25: kyi ngo bor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1909:50b-26: rdo rje nam mkha' ltar sbyar nas smra so zhes
T02D1909:50b-27: pa ste brjod ces pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1909:50b-28: gzhan gyi ched du gleng ba ni spyan sngar 'dug nas brjod pa /
T02D1909:50b-29: ae ma ho zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:50b-30: de ya mtshan che ba'i don te /
T02D1909:50b-31: gzung 'dzin gyis skye ba med pa'i don te /
T02D1909:50b-32: de'i tshul gyis dngos po'i ngo bo ni skye ba ste /
T02D1909:50b-33: 'di ltar rab tu bsgrags zhes bstan pa yin no //
T02D1909:50b-34: de ltar thun mong gi brjod nas khyad par du sangs rgyas drug rnams kyis gsungs te /
T02D1909:50b-35: khyed kyis sems zhes pa la brten nas thugs kyi
T02D1909:50b-36: rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa'i byang chub kyi sems
T02D1909:50b-37: gsungs pa ni de nas zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D1909:50b-38: ste / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis byang chub
T02D1909:50b-39: pa'i tshul zhes chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes la
T02D1909:50b-40: snyoms par zhugs nas zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D1909:50b-41: mtshungs par ldan pa'i gzugs la sogs pa la /
T02D1909:51a-0: dngos po med par bsgom pa ni dngos po nyid @51a * //
T02D1909:51a-2: gang gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po nyid bsgom par bya'o zhe na /
T02D1909:51a-3: de yang kun du brtags pa nyid kyi phyir bsgom pa min zhes so //
T02D1909:51a-4: de ltar dngos po yod pa dang /
T02D1909:51a-5: dngos po med pa gnyi ga ma yin pas /
T02D1909:51a-6: bsgom pa dmigs su med pa'o zhes so //
T02D1909:51a-7: de dag gi don ni 'di skad du /
T02D1909:51a-8: yod med kyi dngos po zhi ba dngos po nyid
T02D1909:51a-9: kun rdzob tu rten 'brel gyi ngo bo snang ba
T02D1909:51a-11: de ltar yin pa nyid kyi sa yang dag par
T02D1909:51a-12: na dngos po gang du yang ma grub pa skyon
T02D1909:51a-13: rnam par dag pa yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur
T02D1909:51a-14: ro // da ni sems lus lta bu zhes pa'i
T02D1909:51a-15: rim pa la brten nas rnam par snang mdzad kyis
T02D1909:51a-16: ro // gsungs pa / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:51a-17: thugs kyi de ma thag tu sku'i rang bzhin ston pas de nas zhes smos so //
T02D1909:51a-18: me long lta bu'i don gang gnyis su med pa'i
T02D1909:51a-19: bdag nyid de ni mngon par rtogs pa la sogs
T02D1909:51a-21: dngos po thams cad dang zhes pa gzugs la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:51a-22: log par rtogs pas gang zag la bdag tu 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i kun du brtags so //
T02D1909:51a-23: de dang bral ba ni phyi rol pa ste de'i phung po lnga dang /
T02D1909:51a-25: skye mched bcu gnyis su 'dod pa yin te /
T02D1909:51a-27: kun brtags kyi mtshan nyid de /
T02D1909:51a-28: rnam par spangs pa des ni phung po la sogs pa'i chos la yang /
T02D1909:51a-29: bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid yin pas /
T02D1909:51a-30: theg pa chen po'i khyad par du gsungs so //
T02D1909:51a-31: de ni don dam par gzhan dbang gi mtshan nyid du rang gi sems mi dmigs pa'i tshe /
T02D1909:51a-32: 'dod pa yin te de rnam rig gi gzhung btsugs pa'o //
T02D1909:51a-33: yang gzhan ma skyes khyad par gsungs pa thog ma nas ma skyes zhes pa ste /
T02D1909:51a-34: ltos pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes ma zhig pa ste /
T02D1909:51a-35: dngos po nyid yang dag par rig pa'o //
T02D1909:51a-36: de nyid khyad par du brtan por bya ba stong
T02D1909:51a-37: pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no zhes te dngos po
T02D1909:51a-38: med pa'i de nyid stong pa nyid do //
T02D1909:51a-39: da ni mi bskyod pa'i gsungs pa ni /
T02D1909:51a-40: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:51a-41: de la mi zad pa'i rdo rje ni 'phel 'grib med pa'o //
T02D1909:51a-42: gang dbyer med pa'i stod pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02D1909:51a-43: de la 'di nyid kyi tshul gyis so //
T02D1909:51b-0: dngos po zhes pa @51b gzugs la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:51b-1: de sgyu ma ltar yin pa nyid kyis /
T02D1909:51b-2: don dam par ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pas de'i phyir chos can snang ba'i ngo bo dang /
T02D1909:51b-3: chos nyid mi snang ba'i ngo bo yang rang bzhin gyis min pa ste /
T02D1909:51b-4: de ltar na ni shin tu med pa'i stong par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T02D1909:51b-5: mi 'gyur te dmigs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo tsam zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1909:51b-6: des na nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pa zhes pa smos so //
T02D1909:51b-7: de'i byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes te /
T02D1909:51b-8: de kho na nyid las mi nyams pa'i don to //
T02D1909:51b-9: 'byung ldan gyis gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:51b-10: de la bdag med pa rdo rje ni /
T02D1909:51b-11: mnyam pa nyid du gang gyur pa de zhes bya
T02D1909:51b-12: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la dkon mchog dpal gyi tshul
