T02D1909:61b-21: de ni ltag 'og tu yang sbyar ro //
T02D1909:61b-22: de nyid kyi yang gsungs pa /
T02D1909:61b-23: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes pa la sogs pa'o//
T02D1909:61b-24: de la nam mkha'i dbyings ni gzhal med khang brtsegs pa'i dbus na zhes te /
T02D1909:61b-25: rig ma bsgom pa ni ye shes rgya mtsho zhes
T02D1909:61b-26: pa ste de bdag nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du
T02D1909:61b-27: byas te / yan lag bzhi la mkhas pas phyag
T02D1909:61b-28: mtshan gyi dbus su zla ba la bsgom par bya'o
T02D1909:61b-29: byas te / // de ltar so sor bskyed nas /
T02D1909:61b-30: tha mi dad par bya ba ni rig ma nyid zhi ba ste /
T02D1909:61b-31: de rdo rje 'dzin gang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang sbyor bar 'dod na bsdu ba ste /
T02D1909:61b-32: de bsten par bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1909:61b-33: rin chen bzhin mchod rten zhes pa /
T02D1909:61b-34: gzhal yas khang brtsegs pa'i mchod rten zhes pa'i don te /
T02D1909:61b-35: rig ma'i gnas rgyan gyi bye brag dang ldan par ston pa ste /
T02D1909:61b-36: de nyid ye shes rgya mtsho ni shes rab ma ste /
T02D1909:61b-37: de dus gsum gyi sems can rnams kyi gnas yin par bsam mo //
T02D1909:61b-38: de dag gi mchod pa rnams ni bdag gi ba
T02D1909:62a-0: spu nas zhes brtsams nas mtha'i bar du @62a *
T02D1909:62a-2: de la autpala dag dang padmo rnam lnga zhes pa
T02D1909:62a-3: ni gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug
T02D1909:62a-4: go // de'i dz'a ti rnams gsum ni lha mo
T02D1909:62a-5: drug po der rab 'bring tha ma'i rigs su dbye
T02D1909:62a-7: spyan ma la sogs pa bzhi gsungs pa ;
T02D1909:62a-8: ka ni ka zhes pa la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02D1909:62a-9: des ni lha mo bcu me tog gi sgrar gsungs so //
T02D1909:62a-10: da ni mchod pa'i khyad par kho nar gsungs pa ni /
T02D1909:62a-11: dpag tshad brgya'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:62a-12: khyon tsam du zhes pa gnas kyi rang bzhin te /
T02D1909:62a-13: de ru mchod par bya ba dgod ces 'brel to //
T02D1909:62a-14: gzhal yas khang brtsegs par 'khor lo bsgom par byas la /
T02D1909:62a-15: de la snang mdzad kyi rigs bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1909:62a-16: padma la sogs pa'i gzhal yas khang dang ldan par
T02D1909:62a-17: byas la rang rang gi dkyil 'khor gong ma bzhin
T02D1909:62a-19: gzugs nyid spros nas mchod par bya'o //
T02D1909:62a-20: de dag gi gnas brtan por bya ba gsungs pa /
T02D1909:62a-21: dpag tshad ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:62a-22: des ni tshad dang dbyibs dang rgyu dang ngo bo bstan to //
T02D1909:62a-23: 'dod pa'i shes pa'i tshig gnyis ni sngon du byas so //
T02D1909:62a-24: 'dir rin chen mchod pa zhes pa la sogs pas phyi'i mchod pa yang bya bar gsungs so //
T02D1909:62a-25: lnga zhes pa lha bshos la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:62a-26: rin chen 'byung gnas nyid gzungs ma ste /
T02D1909:62a-27: de'i rgyan ni sna tshogs zhes te /
T02D1909:62a-28: bsgrub tshe zhes pa bskul ba'i tshe'o //
T02D1909:62a-29: de'i phyir rigs kun la dbul ba'o //
T02D1909:62a-30: de ltar gsang ba dang nang gi mchod pa gsungs nas /
T02D1909:62a-31: phyi'i mchod pa gzhan mos pas sprul nas mchod pa ni /
T02D1909:62a-32: rgyal ba'i zhing khams 'dir bkang la //
T02D1909:62a-34: reg par sbyor ba'i mchod pa gsungs pa bdag po'i
T02D1909:62a-35: phyag rgya mnyam gzhag ces pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1909:62a-36: / rdo rje 'dzin par bsgoms la zhe'o //
T02D1909:62a-37: dam tshig lngas mchod pa ni nam mkha'i zhes pa
T02D1909:62a-38: rnams te dkyil 'khor ni snang mdzad las gyur pa
T02D1909:62a-39: ste / de nyid bdag gi lus so //
T02D1909:62a-40: de la bshang gci nyid dam tshig go //
T02D1909:62a-41: des kyang sbyor ba'i cho ga bya bar gsungs so //
T02D1909:62a-42: de'i yon tan ni 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:62b-0: sngags @62b rnams dngos grub ni ye shes bdud rtsi la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:62b-1: le'u brgyad pa'i don rdzogs so /
T02D1909:62b-3: // / da ni zhu ba sngon du btang nas bde
T02D1909:62b-4: bar byed pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes
T02D1909:62b-5: pa smos te / de la nam mkha' mi 'gyur mchog / ces pa ni don mi ba dang /
T02D1909:62b-6: spyod pa mi 'gyur bas thabs kyi rgyal po ste /
T02D1909:62b-7: de'i phyir nam mkha' zhes brjod de /
T02D1909:62b-8: rdo rje 'dzin pa de la sangs rgyas rnams kyis
T02D1909:62b-9: dbang bskur ba ni rgyal ba rtags kyi dbang dang
T02D1909:62b-10: mkhyen rab thugs kyi dbang dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1909:62b-11: kun mnga' mdzad pa dang kun gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:62b-12: dbang phyug don kun gyis zhes smos te /
T02D1909:62b-13: bshad do zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D1909:62b-15: sku gsung thugs zhes pa rnams te /
T02D1909:62b-16: de'i don ni sems can phas pham pa'i chos rnams
T02D1909:62b-17: la spyod pa rnams 'bras bu ngan par skye ba
T02D1909:62b-18: mthong nas / de las snying rje dang sbyin pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1909:62b-19: cho ga khyad par can dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa
T02D1909:62b-20: pos rang rang gi don dang ldan par bya ste
T02D1909:62b-22: de dag gi yan lag gi don ni so sor bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:62b-23: nam mkha'i zhes pa rnams gsungs te /
T02D1909:62b-24: der rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni rdo rje
T02D1909:62b-25: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te de'i dbus su rdo rje
T02D1909:62b-26: mi bskyod pa bsgoms nas de'i lag tu rdo rje
T02D1909:62b-28: 'dir lha bcu dgu dang ldan par byas nas /
T02D1909:62b-29: rang rang gi bsgrub bya rnams rten dang bral ba
T02D1909:62b-30: la sogs pa'i las kyis / bdag bde bar byed
T02D1909:62b-31: pa rnams phye mar brlag ces pa yin no //
T02D1909:62b-32: 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i las kyi rim pa ste /
T02D1909:62b-33: tsa ra ka pa 'dod pa lta bu ni ma yin no //
T02D1909:62b-34: de ni 'og tu yang sbyar ro //
T02D1909:62b-35: gsang ba 'di lta bu zhes pa'i snying rje chen
T02D1909:62b-36: po la zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor ba sbyin pa dang
T02D1909:62b-37: snyan par smra ba la sogs pa bzhi dang ldan
T02D1909:62b-38: pa cho ga khyad par can dang ldan pa ste
T02D1909:62b-39: / des kun nas mnar sems pa dang ldan pa rnams bsad na ni /
T02D1909:62b-40: de'i mthus rnal 'byor ba nyid kyang zhing dag tu rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1909:62b-41: de'i don ni zhe sdang gi rigs kyi dam tshig de kho na zhes pa yin no //
T02D1909:63a-0: da ni sbyin ba dang mi mthun @63a * //
T02D1909:63a-1: pa'i sems kyis kun du 'dzin pas /
T02D1909:63a-2: rnam smin gyi 'bras bu myong ba dgag pa'i phyir de nas zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:63a-3: de la stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis thar pa rab tu bsgrub pa ste /
T02D1909:63a-4: de'i ngo bo nyid ni rang bzhin gyis gtsang zhing
T02D1909:63a-5: gzhan gyis gos pa med pa zab mo'i don la
T02D1909:63a-7: gang de rnams dang ldan pa de yang de ltar ro //
T02D1909:63a-8: de la nam mkha'i zhes pa ni gnas te /
T02D1909:63a-9: de 'khor lo rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
T02D1909:63a-10: snang mdzad gtso bor gyur pa'i lha bco brgyad dang
T02D1909:63a-11: ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed nas ser sna can gyi
T02D1909:63a-12: dngos po kun mthong nas bzlas pa dang spro ba
T02D1909:63a-14: nor dbrog pa la sogs par bya'o //
T02D1909:63a-15: rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba zhes pa de nyid kyis lha'i gzugs su rab tu brtag go //
T02D1909:63a-16: de'i rang bzhin ser sna can rnams kyi nor rnams 'khor lo'i bdag nyid kyis phrogs nas su /
T02D1909:63a-17: sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje gsum du bsgoms nas /
T02D1909:63a-18: phrogs ma thag pa gang dang ldan pa de rnams
T02D1909:63a-19: yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba la sogs
T02D1909:63a-20: par 'gyur ro // rigs rgya mtsho zhes pa ni
T02D1909:63a-21: zhe sdang la sogs pa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas
T02D1909:63a-23: da ni gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la sems khong nas 'khrug pa'i don du /
T02D1909:63a-24: gzhan bstan pa'i phyir 'dod chags kyi rnal 'byor pa'i las gsungs pa /
T02D1909:63a-25: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:63a-26: de la 'dod chags thar par zhes pa ni so sor rtog pa'i rnam pas /
T02D1909:63a-27: padma'i dkyil 'khor ni de'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1909:63a-28: de'i dbus su mtha' yas gtso bor gyur pa'i lha
T02D1909:63a-29: bco brgyad dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed nas 'dod
T02D1909:63a-30: chags kyi dngos po kun mthong nas bzlas pa la
T02D1909:63a-32: rjes su chags par bud med la spyad pa la sogs pa bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1909:63a-33: yu ma rnams bud med lta bur sbyar ba byas nas de la dam tshig bzhi'i sbyor bas te /
T02D1909:63a-34: phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pas dus bzhi la sbyor ba ste /
T02D1909:63a-35: yul du snang ba thams cad rig ma de ru bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1909:63b-0: @63b de yang nam mkha' khams kyi bud med do //
T02D1909:63b-2: de dag gi gsang ba'i dbang po gnyis sbyar nas bud med la nye bar spyad pa yin no //
T02D1909:63b-3: 'dod chags kyi rigs nyid gzhan gyis kyang bya bar bstan to //
T02D1909:63b-4: de ltar lus kyi don gsum bstan nas /
T02D1909:63b-5: ngag gi brdzun du smra ba'i rnam par dag pa'i
T02D1909:63b-6: don bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes pa la sogs
T02D1909:63b-7: pa smos te / de la rdo rje sngags zhes
T02D1909:63b-8: pa ni rnam par dag pa'i gsung dang ldan pa
T02D1909:63b-9: des sangs rgyas zhes pa las kyi rigs kyi dkyil
T02D1909:63b-10: pa smos te / 'khor te / de'i dbus su
T02D1909:63b-11: don yod grub pa gtso bor gyur pa lha bco
T02D1909:63b-12: brgyad dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed nas gang brdzun
T02D1909:63b-13: du smra ba'i dngos po mthong nas /
T02D1909:63b-14: yang bzlas pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D1909:63b-15: rdo rje tshig gi brdzun bya bar bstan to //
T02D1909:63b-16: de la rdo rje tshig ni gzhan gyi don du
T02D1909:63b-17: dkyil 'khor gyi ngang can gyis gang smras pa des
T02D1909:63b-18: so // bsgrub par bya zhes pa ni brdzun rnam
T02D1909:63b-19: par dag pa gsung dmigs pa'i rang bzhin gyis dngos
T02D1909:63b-20: po nyid gang yin pa'i don bstan to //
T02D1909:63b-21: dam tshig dgug pa'i rigs zhes pa /
T02D1909:63b-22: de nyid gzhan gyis kyang shes par bya'o //
T02D1909:63b-23: da ni ngag rtsub mo la sogs pa rnam par
T02D1909:63b-24: dag pa bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes pa la
T02D1909:63b-26: de la rdo rje mi phyed ces pa ni sku la sogs pa'i rnam pa'o /
T02D1909:63b-27: de dang gang ldan pa des dam tshig ces pa /
T02D1909:63b-28: mi 'da' ba nyid kyi phyir rin po che rigs
T02D1909:63b-29: kyi dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su dkon mchog dpal gtso
T02D1909:63b-30: bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor gong bzhin bskyed nas /
T02D1909:63b-31: gang ngag rtsub mo la sogs pa dang ldan par
T02D1909:63b-32: mthong nas gong la bzhin bzlas pa la sogs pa
T02D1909:63b-33: byas te / de rnams la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1909:63b-34: sogs pa'i sgras ni phra ma dang tshig kyal ba dag go //
T02D1909:63b-35: de ltar lus kyi nyes pa gsum pa dang ngag gi nyes pas rnam par dag par gsungs nas /
T02D1909:63b-36: yid kyi nyes pa gsum rnam par dag pa ni lus dag pa nyid kyis zhes so //
T02D1909:63b-37: de nas ngo mtshar che ba la sogs pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:63b-38: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:63b-39: yang gi sgra ni ched che ba ste /
T02D1909:64a-0: ma 'ongs pa'i skyo bos don nyid shas @64a * //
T02D1909:64a-2: 'dir dam tshig rdo rje ni sa'i snying po gang yin pa dang /
T02D1909:64a-3: dpal zhes pa sgrib pa rnam par sel ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:64a-4: de rnams kyis smras so zhes 'brel to /
T02D1909:64a-5: de ma thag tu lan gsungs pa /
T02D1909:64a-6: de nas zhes pa rnams te rgyal ba rnams kyis bka' stsal to zhes 'brel to //
T02D1909:64a-7: de'i gdams ngag gsungs pa rigs kyi bu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:64a-8: gdod chos 'chad do zhes pa ni don dang ldan pa nyid kyis de la'o //
T02D1909:64a-9: de nas dga' ba'i mdangs kyis ngo mtshar ba ni /
T02D1909:64a-10: de nas byang chub ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:64a-11: 'dir mnyam pa nyid kyi don de yin yang rnam
T02D1909:64a-12: par shes pas gzugs la sogs pa sna tshogs pa
T02D1909:64a-14: don dam pa de dang mi mthun pa nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1909:64a-15: bshad pa mtshar zhes pa yin no //
T02D1909:64a-16: le'u dgu ba'i don rdzogs so /
T02D1909:64a-18: // / da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1909:64a-19: snying po bskul ba la sogs pa bstan pa'i phyir
T02D1909:64a-20: / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:64a-21: de la dam tshig chen po zhes pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1909:64a-22: de la 'dun pa dang bcas te gsol to zhe'o //
T02D1909:64a-23: de'i sngags kyi snying po ni h'um la sogs pa ste zhus pa'o //
T02D1909:64a-24: zhus pa'i de ma thag gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:64a-25: lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni rnam par mi rtog ces pa /
T02D1909:64a-26: gzung 'dzin gyi rnam par rtog pa med pa yin te /
T02D1909:64a-27: mi dmigs pa dang mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:64a-28: gal te'o na ni ci yang med pa yin no zhe na ni ma yin te ;
T02D1909:64a-29: ye shes tsam gnas pa'i phyir rdo rjer bsgom zhes so //
T02D1909:64a-30: yang gsungs pa ni de nas zhes pa rnams te /
T02D1909:64a-31: de la dag pa ni dri ma dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1909:64a-32: pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags kyi tshul ni snang
T02D1909:64a-33: mdzad chen po'i rnam par gang gyur pa de snyoms
T02D1909:64a-35: snang ba las 'das pa'i sngags tshig rnams te /
T02D1909:64a-36: de ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid du mngon no //
T02D1909:64a-37: gang zhi ba la sogs pa'i sgo nas bskul bas /
T02D1909:64a-38: de nas de'i las byed pa ni rig pa ste de rnams dang lhan cig spyod pa yod kyang /
T02D1909:64b-0: sngags kyi spyod pa med na mi 'grub pas @64b spyan ras kyi sa btsa' ba ste /
T02D1909:64b-1: thugs rjes gzung ba'i phyir sngags bsdus pa gsungs pa'o //
T02D1909:64b-2: sngags kyang de thams cad kyang de nyid pa ste /
T02D1909:64b-3: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:64b-4: de rnams kyi snying po skul bar byed pa ni
T02D1909:64b-5: drag shul la sogs pa'i sgo nas sku dang gsung
T02D1909:64b-6: dang thugs kyi sngags rnam par dag pa gsungs pa
T02D1909:64b-7: ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o
T02D1909:64b-8: // de la tshig gi lam ni ljags te des gsungs so //
T02D1909:64b-9: de'i mthu gsungs pa ni de nas 'di ni zhes pa ste /
T02D1909:64b-10: gang ldan pa de brjod na der 'gyur ba yin no //
T02D1909:64b-11: de nas h'um las gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyir /
T02D1909:64b-12: de nas phyag na rdo rje zhes pa smos te /
T02D1909:64b-13: 'dir dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa bkod pa de'i dbus kyi
T02D1909:64b-14: gdan brtsegs ma la yi ge h'um las gyur pa'i
T02D1909:64b-15: rdo rje 'dzin rang gi gzugs su rab tu brtag
T02D1909:64b-16: go // sku gsung thugs zhes pa ni rdo rje
T02D1909:64b-17: 'dzin nyid kyi sa bon h'um snying la rnal 'byor
T02D1909:64b-18: pa de yis bsgoms na der 'gyur ro //
T02D1909:64b-19: des ni sku nyid bsgom pa ni ma yin no //
T02D1909:64b-20: de'i rang gi dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni mi bskyod
T02D1909:64b-21: pa la sogs pa gzhal yas khang du sprul pa
T02D1909:64b-22: ste / rang sngags ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
T02D1909:64b-23: la sogs pa rang rang gi gtso bo'i snying po
T02D1909:64b-25: bskul ba'i sngags dang 'brel pa'i sku mdog la sogs
T02D1909:64b-26: pa bstan pa ni rang sngags skyes bu zhes pa
T02D1909:64b-27: ste / gtso bo rang rang gi sa bon kho nas rang rang gi dkyil 'khor du bsgoms nas /
T02D1909:64b-28: de dag gi snying ga dang mgo dang lce steng dang gsang ba ni gnas bzhi'o //
T02D1909:64b-29: der sku mdog la sogs pa dang ldan pa ni gzugs kyi tshul te /
T02D1909:64b-30: de zhal gsum gyi tshul gyis dkar po la sogs pa kha dog kyang gsum du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1909:64b-31: de la 'di ni zhes pa gong gi phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa'i sku gsung thugs so //
T02D1909:64b-32: snying ga'i dbus su zhes pa /
T02D1909:64b-33: rang rang gi gnas su zla ba dang rang rang gi phyag mtshan gyi dbus su /
T02D1909:64b-34: sa bon las gyur pa'i phra mo'i dkyil 'khor ni bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1909:64b-35: de'i mdun du ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor yang bsam par bya'o //
T02D1909:65a-2: sa bon thams cad kyi mchog ni h'um ste /
T02D1909:65a-3: de'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam par bya'o //
T02D1909:65a-6: rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa //
T02D1909:65a-8: de la rtag tu zhes pa ni dus bzhi'o //
T02D1909:65a-9: sbyor bas zhes pa ni ting 'dzin gsum la gang sbyor ba'o //
T02D1909:65a-10: kyo ba ni rdo rje lcags kyo'i khyad par gyis so //
T02D1909:65a-11: rdo rje gsum ni sku la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:65a-12: de nas ye shes sems dpa' de'i snying gar lcags
T02D1909:65a-13: kyos brdab ste dz'a la sogs pas bskul bar bya'o
T02D1909:65a-14: // gzhan dag kyang bskul ba ni 'khor lo zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:65a-15: rigs zhes pa ni gzhan la yang sbyar ro //
T02D1909:65a-16: de yang 'od zer gyi ngo bo'i rdo rje'i lcags kyos bskul bar bshad ces so //
T02D1909:65a-17: sngags kyi che ba gsungs pa 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //

T02D1909:72a-18: gal te de lta ma yin na /
T02D1909:72a-19: rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa yang na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:72a-20: le'u bcu gnyis pa'i don rdzogs so /
T02D1909:72a-22: // / da ni rdo rje dam tshig bkod pa de
T02D1909:72a-23: kho na nyid kyi don bsgom pa bstan pa'i phyir
T02D1909:72a-24: / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:72a-25: de la ye shes rdo rje zhes pa la sogs
T02D1909:72a-26: pas ni gtso bo la don zhu ba'i phyir phyag
T02D1909:72a-28: bstod ba'i de ma thag bshad par gsol ba btab
T02D1909:72a-29: pa ni sngags rnams zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1909:72a-30: bshad du gsol zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D1909:72a-31: de la sangs rgyas tshul re bzang //
T02D1909:72a-32: zhes pa la sogs pa ni sku la sogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1909:72a-33: rigs rnams kyi sngags rnams bsdus pa'i mchog ni rdo rje bzlas pa ste /
T02D1909:72a-34: sku'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1909:72a-35: rigs dang sngags zhes pa ni rig ma dang ldan
T02D1909:72a-36: pa'i lha rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyis kyang mtshan
T02D1909:72b-0: pa'o // sngags zlos zhes pa @72b dang ;
T02D1909:72b-1: ye shes rgya mtsho zhes pa la sogs pas ni rig ma dang ldan pa gang yin pas /
T02D1909:72b-2: aom la sogs pa'i sa bon srog dang rtsol ba'i
T02D1909:72b-3: sgo nas spro ba la sogs pa'i cho ga bya
T02D1909:72b-4: bar bstan to // zhus pa'i de ma thag gsungs pa de nas ston pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:72b-5: gsungs so zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D1909:72b-6: de la byed pa bskyed pa ni kun gyi byed pa po lta bu yang yin la /
T02D1909:72b-7: sprul pa rnams bskyed pa'ang yin no //
T02D1909:72b-8: de'i rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyis gang mtshan pa de de ltar yin la /
T02D1909:72b-9: rdo rje dbye ba gsum zhes pa kun rdzob tu
T02D1909:72b-10: sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje dbye ba gsum gyi
T02D1909:72b-11: mthar phyin pa ni bkod pa rdo rje gsum zhes
T02D1909:72b-12: bya'o // gnas rnams su zhes pa rang rang gi
T02D1909:72b-13: gnas su sku la sogs pa'i sa bon gyis rang
T02D1909:72b-14: rang gi rim pas spro ba byas na zhes so
T02D1909:72b-15: bya'o // // rgyal ba rnams dang gnyis su med
T02D1909:72b-16: par bsgoms nas mchod pa'i mchog lha mo rnams kyis
T02D1909:72b-17: brtag par bya ba ye shes rdo rje rnal 'byor
T02D1909:72b-19: gzugs kyi mchog brtag pa zhes pa spro ba la sogs pa'i sgo nas /
T02D1909:72b-20: phyag rgya chen pos dbyings khyab par bya'o //
T02D1909:72b-21: da ni dbye ba rnam gsum gyis //
T02D1909:72b-22: zhes pa ni snang mdzad la sogs par gnas shing
T02D1909:72b-23: de rnams nyid so so dag tu spro bar bya'o
T02D1909:72b-24: // yang gzhan spro ba'i phyir lus dang zhes pa rnams smos te /
T02D1909:72b-25: lus la sogs pa bdag med par shes pa'i sems kyis sngags rnams brjod nas /
T02D1909:72b-26: sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje spro ba ni sngags
T02D1909:72b-27: brjod pa rdzogs nas rang rang gi gnas su bsdu
T02D1909:72b-28: bar bya'o // da ni spyi'i de ma thag sku
T02D1909:72b-29: la sogs pa khyad par gyi bzlas pa bstan pa'i
T02D1909:72b-30: bar bya'o // phyir / thams cad kyi sku'i rdo rje byang chub pa'i zhes smos te /
T02D1909:72b-31: de la dang po sku'i mngon par byang chub pa bstan pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1909:72b-32: dngos dang dngos min zhes pa lus kyi tha snyad gang dngos por gnas pa dang /
T02D1909:72b-33: dngos po med pa rnams gnyi gar mi ston cing /
T02D1909:72b-34: gang du yang ma grub pa ni rnam dpyad pa'o //
T02D1909:72b-35: de ni sku zhes bya bar bshad ces te /
T02D1909:72b-36: de ni sku'i bzlas pa yin no //
T02D1909:72b-37: gsung gi rdo rje byang chub pa'i //
T02D1909:73a-1: gsung gi bzlas pa bstan to //
T02D1909:73a-2: sgra dang sgra min zhes pa ngag gi tha snyad
T02D1909:73a-3: dang tha snyad ma yin pa gnyi ga mi bsten
T02D1909:73a-5: de ni gsung gi bzlas pa yin no //
T02D1909:73a-6: thugs kyi dam tshig byang chub pa'i //
T02D1909:73a-7: zhes pas ni thugs kyi bzlas pa ston te //
T02D1909:73a-8: gnas pa'i rdo rje zhes pa shes pa'i tha snyad mi bsten pa rnam dpyad pa'o //
T02D1909:73a-9: de ni sems kyi bzlas par bshad do //
T02D1909:73a-10: yon tan gyi bzlas pa bstan pa'i phyir don rtogs zhes smos te /
T02D1909:73a-11: de la don ni mnyam pa nyid do //
T02D1909:73a-12: de rtogs pa'i bzlas pa ni dngos po'i ngo bo nyid med pa ni bzang po ste /
T02D1909:73a-13: des yang dag par rig pa'i sgo nas brtags pa
T02D1909:73a-14: ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi bzlas pa yin no
T02D1909:73a-15: // phrin las kyi bzlas pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:73a-16: sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhes pa smos te /
T02D1909:73a-17: de la sku'i sprin ni de nyid mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1909:73a-18: de ni spro ba yang yin la bzhud pa yang de nyid pas de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1909:73a-20: de ni thogs med ces te don grub kyi bzlas pa yin no bzlas pa gzhan gsungs pa /
T02D1909:73a-21: khro bo'i zhes pa rnams te /
T02D1909:73a-22: de la dam tshig ye shes ni khro ba'i cha lugs su bsgom pa'o //
T02D1909:73a-23: de rang gi dkyil 'khor du khro bo'i sngags kyi
T02D1909:73a-24: yi ge bzlas pas pha rol po'i rna bar sgra
T02D1909:73a-25: grags pa de ni zhes so //
T02D1909:73a-26: dang la gti mug gi bzlas pa gsungs pa /
T02D1909:73a-27: 'dod pa'i don gyis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:73a-28: de la 'dod pa ni log par 'dod pa'o //
T02D1909:73a-29: de'i don gyis myos par 'gyur ba rnams skyob cing phan gdags pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:73a-30: sems can mang po rnams de dag nyid du zhes te /
T02D1909:73a-31: gti mug gi rang bzhin snang mdzad la bzhag nas
T02D1909:73a-32: de nyid spro ba dang bsdu ba de ni gti
T02D1909:73a-33: mug gi bzlas pa yin no //
T02D1909:73a-34: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gi don yang de ltar sbyar ro //
T02D1909:73a-36: dam tshig yang dag ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:73a-37: de la dbu ma zhes pa yum gyi padma'o //
T02D1909:73a-38: rdo rje can zhes pa gsang ba'i rdo rje dang gang ldan pa'o //
T02D1909:73a-39: dam tshig ni gnyis su med de gcig pa'o //
T02D1909:73b-0: de ltar @73b pho dang mo'i khyad par med par
T02D1909:73b-1: gang gyur pa ni ma ning gi bzlas pa zhes
T02D1909:73b-2: bya'o // de yi 'dod chags don bsgoms pa //
T02D1909:73b-4: sbyor ba'i cho ga dang ldan par byed pa'o //
T02D1909:73b-5: rdo rje bdag po ni lha mo drug gi bdag po rnams so //
T02D1909:73b-6: de nyid lha mo rnams kyis 'dod chags skye sa
T02D1909:73b-7: pas yab rnams kyis byang chub kyi sems rdzogs par
T02D1909:73b-9: rigs rnams kyi sbyor ba gsungs pa /
T02D1909:73b-10: rig ma chen mo'i spyan zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:73b-11: de la 'dod pa ni 'dod par bya ba'o //
T02D1909:73b-12: de la brtson pa dang longs spyod pa dang gang
T02D1909:73b-13: ldan pas rig ma 'dod na ni bsten na 'grub
T02D1909:73b-14: par 'gyur ro // gti mug ni sku'i dam tshig
T02D1909:73b-15: las byung ba sa bon te de nyid ma ning
T02D1909:73b-16: par 'gyur ro // ste / de'i gnas ni spyan ma la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:73b-18: 'dir khro bo ni zhe sdang gi gnas las skyes te /
T02D1909:73b-19: rdo rje 'dzin gyi rigs kyis skye ba yin no /
T02D1909:73b-20: de dang gang ldan pa des bsgrub par bya ba'i
T02D1909:73b-21: chos can drug gsum la gnas pa de dag thabs
T02D1909:73b-23: de ni ye shes 'khor lo can //
T02D1909:73b-24: zhes pa la sogs pas ni thig le sbyar ba'i ting nga [*nge] 'dzin bstan to //
T02D1909:73b-25: 'dir snang mdzad kyi rigs su gang gyur pas ye
T02D1909:73b-26: shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying gar 'khor lo
T02D1909:73b-27: bsgom / de'i yang dbus su gsal ba zla ba
T02D1909:73b-28: la 'khor lo sngags don zhes pa rang gi sa
T02D1909:73b-29: bon bhr'um mi spro ba'i bdag nyid du bsgom par
T02D1909:73b-30: bsgom / bya'o // gzhan la yang rim pa bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1909:73b-31: spro bsdu'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:73b-33: bdag gtso bo dbus su bsams nas /
T02D1909:73b-34: de'i ngos bzhir gtso bo nyid ma gtogs pa'i rigs
T02D1909:73b-35: bzhi bkod nas de dag gi 'od zer lnga 'phro
T02D1909:73b-37: spro ba ni bye brag gnyis zhes pa sku gsum dang rdo rje'i bye brag gnyis so //
T02D1909:73b-38: spro ba ni bsdu ba zhes pa sku la sogs
T02D1909:73b-39: pa'i sa bon ni rigs kyis sam yang na cig
T02D1909:73b-41: rdo rje ye shes kyi sa bon dus gcig kho nar spro bar bya'o //
T02D1909:74a-1: zhes pa lus ngag yid gsum rnam par dag pa snang mdzad la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:74a-2: de rnams kyis sku la sogs pa rang rang gi sa bon spro na mchod pa'i gnas zhes te /
T02D1909:74a-4: des ni bye brag gnyis las sku gsum gyi tshul lo //
T02D1909:74a-5: rdo rje'i tshul ni dkyil 'khor zhes pa rnams te /
T02D1909:74a-6: phrin las kyi don yang bstan te /
T02D1909:74a-7: snang mdzad du bsgoms la phyogs bzhir rigs bzhi bsgoms nas /
T02D1909:74a-8: de la dbus su bdag po ni sku la sogs
T02D1909:74a-9: pa dang ldan pa'i gzugs su bsams nas gtso bo
T02D1909:74a-10: la sogs pa rang sngags sa bon las gyur pa'i
T02D1909:74a-11: gzugs dag ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1909:74a-12: bzhi dag tu kha dog dkar po la sogs par
T02D1909:74a-13: brtags la / de rnams kyi snying gar ye shes
T02D1909:74a-14: kyi sa bon bsgoms na zhi ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1909:74a-15: rdo rje bzhi'i las byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1909:74a-16: da ni bsam pa'i dbang gis so so'i tshul bstan
T02D1909:74a-17: pa'i phyir na zhi ba la ni des smos te
T02D1909:74a-18: / snang mdzad 'dir bsgyur nas spyan gyi tshul du dkar por bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1909:74a-19: rgyas pa la padmo can te /
T02D1909:74a-20: ser po dang ldan pa'i rdo rje chos bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1909:74a-21: dbang la bsgyur nas dmar po dang ldan pa'i rin chen 'byung ldan bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1909:74a-22: rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo'i gzugs nag po mngon spyod la bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1909:74a-23: spyod pa'i rol mo ni de dang 'dra ba ste /
T02D1909:74a-24: kun rdzob pa la dgongs pa'o //
T02D1909:74a-25: mngon spyod kho na'i bsgrub bya ni /
T02D1909:74a-26: ma chags pa'i zhes pa rnams so //
T02D1909:74a-27: yang de nyid kyi cho ga ni khams gsum gnas pa'i zhes pa rnams kyis bstan to //
T02D1909:74a-28: de la de'i sems can rnyog pa med par byas te /
T02D1909:74a-30: bsad pa ni bsad pa'i cho gas so //
T02D1909:74a-31: 'khor lo rtse lnga kha bzhi pa lte ba'i rtse
T02D1909:74a-32: la phyogs bzhir rtsibs bzhir shar ba ni rtse bzhi
T02D1909:74a-33: ste / des kha bzhir yang mngon no //
T02D1909:74a-34: de'i lte ba la rdo rje ste /
T02D1909:74a-35: de las gyur pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' mngon spyod
T02D1909:74a-36: la bsgoms la rdo rje dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo
T02D1909:74a-37: 'di de'i lag pas gzung bar bya ste /
T02D1909:74b-0: phyogs dus kyi sems @74b can rnams sangs rgyas su bsams nas /
T02D1909:74b-1: bdag nyid sku la sogs pa'i bye brag gis 'od zer gyi tshul du bsdus te /
T02D1909:74b-2: bdag nyid kyi sku gsum la gzud pa byas nas spro ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1909:74b-3: gdug pa can gzhil ba'i phyir khro bo zhes smos te /
T02D1909:74b-4: de'i ngang tshul dang mdog dang tshul dang phyag mtshan dang ldan par spros nas /
T02D1909:74b-5: rdo rje sems dpa' yang zhes pa ni gzhan lta ci smos zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1909:74b-6: de ltar cho ga bzhin byas nas ma grub na /
T02D1909:74b-7: sangs rgyas nyid kyang nyen che bar gsungs pa rmongs pas zhes pa'i tshig go //
T02D1909:74b-8: da ni nam mkha'i dbyings zhes pa la sogs pas
T02D1909:74b-9: ni sems can rnams bdag gi lus la bsdu zhing
T02D1909:74b-10: / gsad par bya ba'i cho ga bstan to //
T02D1909:74b-11: de la 'khor lo zhes pa yang rtse lnga pa ste /
T02D1909:74b-12: de'i phyi rol du rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan pa'o //
T02D1909:74b-13: de la snang mdzad du bsgoms te /
T02D1909:74b-14: 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i snang mdzad rdo rje ni de'i phyag na bsnams par bsgoms te /
T02D1909:74b-15: de'i lus la bsdu ba dang /
T02D1909:74b-16: spro ba la sogs pa ni gong ma bzhin bya'o //
T02D1909:74b-17: bsad ba'i sbyor ba ni tshul dang ldan pas khro
T02D1909:74b-18: bo la sogs pa sku gsung thugs kyi zhes pa
T02D1909:74b-19: la sogs pa'i tshig gis bsgom par bya'o ;
T02D1909:74b-20: / da ni gshin rje gshed kyi las bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:74b-21: sangs rgyas zhes pa smos te /
T02D1909:74b-22: de la 'khor lo can zhes pa gtso bor byas pa'i gshin rje gshed do //
T02D1909:74b-23: rang gi rdo rje zhes pa rang gi sa bon
T02D1909:74b-24: shr'i las bskyed pa de'i phyag na rdo rje bsnams
T02D1909:74b-25: par brtag ste / de yis gang la bya ba bsad par bsgom pa'i don to //
T02D1909:74b-26: yang sku gsung thugs zhes pa la sogs pas ni bka'i 'khor los bsrung bar bstan te /
T02D1909:74b-27: de la gang gis bsrung ba ni sku zhes pa rnams dang /
T02D1909:74b-28: de nyid kyi yon tan nam h'um mdzad yang na gtsug tor ram zhes te /
T02D1909:74b-29: de rnams kyis 'dir sngags spyod pa'i sems can bsrung ba'i phyir /
T02D1909:74b-30: bka' yi 'khor los bskul bar bya //
T02D1909:74b-32: sku la sogs pa la sangs rgyas dang 'dra ba gzud pa dang /
T02D1909:74b-34: nam mkha' zhes pa rnams te /
T02D1909:74b-35: chos zhes pa mtha' yas so //
T02D1909:75a-2: sku mchog ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1909:75a-3: de rnams las byung ba'i sku gsum gyi sa bon dbyings nyid du brtag par bya'o //
T02D1909:75a-4: de las gyur pas mkha' dbyings gang bar bsgom mo //
T02D1909:75a-5: de dag gi yang snying gar rang sngags sa bon
T02D1909:75a-6: la thugs kyi rdo rje bsams nas spro ba la
T02D1909:75a-7: sogs pa bya'o // da ni rgya mtsho mnan pa'i
T02D1909:75a-8: cho ga gsungs pa rnam pa'i zhes pa la sogs
T02D1909:75a-9: sogs pa bya'o // pa'o // de la rdo rje sems dpar gang gyur pa de'i gnas rnams su /
T02D1909:75a-10: snang mdzad la sogs pa rim par bkod nas /
T02D1909:75a-11: sangs rgyas phal por chu'i rang bzhin bsams la /
T02D1909:75a-12: de'i steng na de dag dang 'dra ba'i rkang pas bcag par bya'o //
T02D1909:75a-14: spyi po'i steng du zhes so //
T02D1909:75a-15: da ni phas kyi rgol ba'i cho ga bstan pa ni dbang chen zhes pa rnams te /
T02D1909:75a-16: de la dbang chen zhes pa lam ser po las
T02D1909:75a-17: gyur pa'i gzhi bsgoms la don grub kyi skur bsams
T02D1909:75a-18: nas / de'i lag pa g-yas par khro bo gzhag
T02D1909:75a-19: la las kyi sku'i rdo rje rgya gram gyi rkang
T02D1909:75a-20: bas rgol ba thams cad kyi spyi bor gnon par
T02D1909:75a-21: nas / bsgom mo // da ni rdo rje gsum
T02D1909:75a-22: mchog ces pa la sogs pas ni dbang dang ldan
T02D1909:75a-23: zhing dpung gnon pa bstan te /
T02D1909:75a-24: sku la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor khro bo'i tshul du bsams nas /
T02D1909:75a-25: yig 'bru las bskyed pa'i bsgrub bya ri rab tsam bsams pa'i spyi bor bsgoms na zhe'o //
T02D1909:75a-26: dgra rmongs par byed pa ni dgra'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:75a-27: sa bon gyis bskyed pa'i snying gar ji skad gsungs pa'i phur bus gdab par bya'o //
T02D1909:75a-28: yang grong la sogs pa'i nad rnams zhi bar bya ba ni /
T02D1909:75a-29: grong ngam yang na ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:75a-30: de la rtse lnga pa bar snang dag la zhes pa ni spro bar bya ba ste /
T02D1909:75a-31: bskal pas bsregs pa bzhin du rdo rjes nad la sogs pa yang de ltar bsam par bya'o //
T02D1909:75a-32: rgyas par bya ba ni nor bu zhes ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:75a-33: skye 'gro 'dul ba ni yi dam zhes pa rnams te /
T02D1909:75a-34: dang la rang gi lha rdzogs par byas nas /
T02D1909:75a-35: rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil pa nyid ji skad gsungs
T02D1909:75a-36: pa'i phur bu byas nas phyogs bcu'i bsgrub bya la
T02D1909:75b-0: na mo ratna tra y'a zhes @75b pa'i sngags kyis
T02D1909:75b-1: gdab par bya'o // de rnams kyis mngon spyod kyi las kyi khyad par bstan to //
T02D1909:75b-2: da ni zhi ba'i las bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:75b-3: mdangs bzang zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:75b-4: gnas su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rang gi sa bon las gyur ba'i snang mdzad bsgoms nas /
T02D1909:75b-5: rang ci 'dra ba'i ye shes kyi snying gar 'dod pa ste /
T02D1909:75b-6: 'dir spyan ma nyid bzhag la de las rang gi
T02D1909:75b-7: sa bon gyis nam mkha'i dbyings 'phros pas gang bar
T02D1909:75b-8: bsgom mo // de nas de rnams lus la bsdus
T02D1909:75b-9: nas de'i gong bus bsgrub bya la 'od zer dbab
T02D1909:75b-10: bsgom mo // pa dang / ba spu'i bu gnas
T02D1909:75b-11: sangs rgyas spros pas bsgrub bya gang yin pa de
T02D1909:75b-12: la dbang bskur ba stsol bar mdzad do //
T02D1909:75b-13: de bzhin du phyi ma la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1909:75b-14: da ni rgyas pa'i las bstan pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings zhes pa rnams smos te /
T02D1909:75b-15: de la dbang chen zhes pa ni gzhi ste /
T02D1909:75b-16: de'i zla ba la sa bon las gyur ba'i 'od dpag med bsams nas zhes te /
T02D1909:75b-17: gzhan dag ni gong du byas so //
T02D1909:75b-18: dbang gi las bstan pa'i phyir nam mkha'i zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:75b-19: de la de'i zla gam la rdo rje mkha'i zhes te /
T02D1909:75b-20: rang gi sa bon las gyur pa rin chen 'byung
T02D1909:75b-21: ldan snang mdzad kyi mdog dang ldan par bsgom par
T02D1909:75b-23: da ni drag po'i las gong du bstan pa dang 'brel pa 'di yang bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:75b-24: nam mkha'i zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:75b-25: 'dir yang gdan la rang gi sa bon las gyur
T02D1909:75b-26: pa bsgoms nas gong gi cho ga ji lta bas
T02D1909:75b-27: rdo rje srin po la sogs pa 'phros nas /
T02D1909:75b-28: gang bar bsgoms pas me'i dkyil 'khor de la gnas pa'i dgra rnams brlag par bya'o //
T02D1909:75b-29: da ni snang mdzad la sogs pa rig ma dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1909:75b-30: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa rnams kyi zhal dang
T02D1909:75b-31: mdog la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su blang
T02D1909:75b-32: ba'i phyir / rnam par snang mdzad zhal gsum pa zhes pa la sogs pa rim bzhin smos so //
T02D1909:75b-33: de la 'dam bu zhes pa khab lo'i rgyu'o //
T02D1909:75b-34: mkha' skyes zhes pa m'a ma k'i'o //
T02D1909:76a-0: zhal skyes zhes pa gos dkar @76a * //
T02D1909:76a-2: / bzang mo zhes pa sgrol ma'o //
T02D1909:76a-3: takki'i rgyal po zhes pa ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa drug go //
T02D1909:76a-4: yi ge gcig ces pa gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa bon bhr'um mo //
T02D1909:76a-5: khro bo gzhan yang gsungs pa /
T02D1909:76a-6: gzi brjid ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:76a-7: de nas gong du blang ba zhes pa smos pas
T02D1909:76a-8: zhal la sogs pa bstan nas da ni gong gi
T02D1909:76a-9: snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams dkyil 'khor la sogs
T02D1909:76a-10: pa dang ldan par bsgoms pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:76a-11: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes pa nas mtha'i bar du smos so //
T02D1909:76a-12: de la gsal ba ni gzhal yas khang brtsegs pa'i
T02D1909:76a-13: nang du zla ba'i gdan la sangs rgyas gzugs zhes
T02D1909:76a-14: te / mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la /
T02D1909:76a-15: de'i dbus su snang mdzad gtso bor gyur ba bsams te /
T02D1909:76a-16: de'i tshul ni gsal zhing zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:76a-17: cho ga bzhin du 'di'i don bsgoms na de'i zhes
T02D1909:76a-18: pa la sogs pa ji skad gsungs pa'i yon tan
T02D1909:76a-20: de ltar phyi ma la yang ji ltar sbyar ba bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1909:76a-21: yang dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom pa gsungs pa /
T02D1909:76a-22: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:76a-23: de la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa thugs kyi gdan no //
T02D1909:76a-24: de la sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
T02D1909:76a-25: rdo rje sems dpa' cho ga ji lta bas bsgoms
T02D1909:76a-26: na zhe'o // mtha' yas gtso bor gyur ba ni chos kyi zhes pa rnams te /
T02D1909:76a-27: de la chos ni zhes pa rang gi gdan na //
T02D1909:76a-28: de nam mkha'i rdo rje gzhal yas khang gi dbus su zhes te /
T02D1909:76a-29: de la 'khor dang ldan pa'i chos mtha' yas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1909:76a-30: phyi ma nyid kyang rjes su dpag par bya'o //
T02D1909:76a-31: de dag gi yul rnams bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:76a-32: zla ba'i zhes pa smos so //
T02D1909:76a-33: de la zla ba zhes pa rang rang gi gtso
T02D1909:76a-34: bo dang gnyis su med pa'i phyir rang gi gdan
T02D1909:76a-35: no // sangs rgyas gzugs zhes pa rang gi gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor rnams so //
T02D1909:76a-36: des ni spyan ma bsgom par bstan to //
T02D1909:76a-37: de la m'a ma k'ir bsgom pa ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa rnams so //
T02D1909:76b-0: de la rdo rje dang @76b sangs rgyas gzugs zhes pa gong ma bzhin no //
T02D1909:76b-1: 'di'i spyan dang rdo rje'i mchog ni m'a ma k'i kho na'o //
T02D1909:76b-2: yang gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma dang bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1909:76b-3: chos kyi zhes pa dang dngos grub ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:76b-4: de dag gi don ni rang rang gi gdan la
T02D1909:76b-5: gtso bo dang ldan par bsgom na ji skad bshad
T02D1909:76b-6: pa'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T02D1909:76b-7: da ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bzhi dang
T02D1909:76b-8: 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa'i khro bo drug
T02D1909:76b-9: bstan pa'i phyir nyi ma'i zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D1909:76b-10: smos so // de la nyi ma ni nyi ma ste gdan no //
T02D1909:76b-11: de gzhal yas khang gi dbus su bsam mo //
T02D1909:76b-12: sangs rgyas gzugs zhes pa snang mdzad dang lo tsan
T02D1909:76b-13: la sogs pa bsgoms la de dag gi byang chub
T02D1909:76b-14: kyi sems las rang gi gshin rje gshed la sogs
T02D1909:76b-15: pa sprul te / shar gyi rtsibs la sogs pa
T02D1909:76b-16: la ji skad gsungs pa'i zhal la sogs pa dang
T02D1909:76b-17: ldan par bsgom mo zhes mdor bsdus so //
T02D1909:76b-18: de la spyan dmar mche ba zhes pa gshin rje
T02D1909:76b-19: gshed la sogs pa mi sdug pa'i gzugs dang smin
T02D1909:76b-20: mtshams kyi khro gnyer dang sdang mig dang skra gyen
T02D1909:76b-23: aag tshom 'bar ba spyan bgrad pa /
T02D1909:76b-25: mche ba gtsigs shing gad mo sgrogs pa shin tu mi bzad pa'i sprul la sogs pas brgyan pa'o //
T02D1909:76b-26: snang mdzad dbu rgyan la zhes pa rang rang gi rigs kyis dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1909:76b-27: de dag gi gnas ni 'di nyid kyi rim pas phyogs bcur ro //
T02D1909:76b-28: phyi ma la yang de ltar ro //
T02D1909:76b-29: khro bo rnams kyi de ma thag sangs rgyas 'khor lo zhes pa smos te /
T02D1909:76b-30: lha'i ting nge 'dzin las gyur ba'i khro bos de nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1909:76b-31: le'u bcu gsum pa'i don rdzogs so /
T02D1909:76b-33: // / da ni sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las rnams
T02D1909:76b-34: sngags kyis dgug pa'i rnam par sprul pa'i don bstan
T02D1909:76b-35: pa'i phyir bcu bzhi pa'i de na zhes pa la
T02D1909:76b-37: de nas zhi ba'i dam tshig ces pa zhi bar
T02D1909:76b-38: bya ba ni spyan ma'i sngags 'dis bya ba'i phyir
T02D1909:77a-0: te / de dang lhan cig pa'i yab rnams kyang gsungs @77a * //
T02D1909:77a-2: de ni 'og tu yang snyegs so //
T02D1909:77a-3: las rnams sgrub pa'i phyir de la snyoms par zhugs nas she'o //
T02D1909:77a-4: aom ru ru zhes pa la sogs pa lo tsan
T02D1909:77a-5: la sogs pa rim pa'i sngags gsungs pa rjes su
T02D1909:77a-6: dran zhes te / thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'o //
T02D1909:77a-7: zhi 'byung ba zhes pa ni zhi bar byed pa ste /
T02D1909:77a-8: der ma zad de nyid rnam par bsgyur bas rgyas
T02D1909:77a-9: pa la sogs pa'i las rnams sgrub cing bskul bar
T02D1909:77a-10: mdzad pa ste / gzhan la yang sbyar ro //
T02D1909:77a-11: rgyas par ni gong du bshad do //
T02D1909:77a-12: shi ba sos par byed ces pa yi ges bskyed
T02D1909:77a-13: pa'i bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan bsams la de'i snying gar
T02D1909:77a-14: zla ba la snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags bkod
T02D1909:77a-15: de / bdag gtso bo yab yum gyi skur bsams nas /
T02D1909:77a-16: de'i sbyor ba'i sprin lcags kyor gyur te /
T02D1909:77a-17: des shi ba nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i shes pa nri
T02D1909:77a-18: aam gu sha dzas bkug nas ro gong ma la
T02D1909:77a-19: bstims pa de las gtso bo'i skur gyur nas gnyis
T02D1909:77a-20: su med par byas na sos par 'gyur ro //
T02D1909:77a-21: da ni m'a ma k'i'i sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:77a-22: yang de nas zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:77a-23: rjes dran zhes pa la sogs pa gong ma bzhin no //
T02D1909:77a-24: rdo rje srung ba ni 'dis dbang du byed pa'o //
T02D1909:77a-25: des kyang las rnams bsgyur ba'i sgo nas 'grub par bstan to //
T02D1909:77a-26: de'i 'jigs pa las bskyabs pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1909:77a-27: des bsrungs na mthu dang ldan par bshad pa yin no //
T02D1909:77a-28: 'dir yang gos dkar mo'i sngags bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes pa rnams smos te /
T02D1909:77a-29: 'dod chags chen po ni rdo rje chos kyi ste /
T02D1909:77a-31: chos ni rgyas mdzad pa zhes pa ni chud pa'i dang lung gi chos so //
T02D1909:77a-32: de nyid zad mi shes pa'i phyir mdzod ces so //
T02D1909:77a-33: dam tshig tsam gyis zhes pa rigs su gang gyur
T02D1909:77a-34: bas de'i sngags smras pa tsam gyis kyang byed par
T02D1909:77a-35: 'gyur ro // mjug gi sgrol ma'i bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes pa la sogs pa bstan te /
T02D1909:77a-36: kun du 'byung ba ni las thams cad 'byung bas lha mo las kyi ting nge 'dzin no //
T02D1909:77a-37: de dag gi cho ga ni 'di skad du snang
T02D1909:77a-38: mdzad la sogs par gang gyur ba'i rnal 'byor bas
T02D1909:77b-0: rang rang gi @77b spyan ma la sogs pa mdog
T02D1909:77b-1: la sogs pa dang ldan par sbyor ba byas nas
T02D1909:77b-2: / de rnams dang de rnams nyid ci 'dra ba'i snying ga'i gdan la /
T02D1909:77b-3: so so'i sngags kyi phreng ba mgo nang du bcug
T02D1909:77b-4: / rkang pa phyir bstan pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis
T02D1909:77b-5: / rang rang gi yi ges bskyed pa'i bsgrub bya'i gnas nas bskul te /
T02D1909:77b-6: slar gong gi ci 'dra ba'i lha mo'i padma nas zhugs te /
T02D1909:77b-7: bzlas pa la sogs pa byas nas gang bya ba rnams 'grub par bstan to //
T02D1909:77b-8: da ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:77b-9: de nas zhas pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:77b-10: de la dri ma med pa'i zhes pa ni snang
T02D1909:77b-11: mdzad kyi gnyis su med pa'i sprin las sprul pa
T02D1909:77b-12: ste / thugs kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1909:77b-13: phyung ba'i sngags rnams ni sgra bshad par mi bya'o //
T02D1909:77b-14: sngags kyi che ba bstan pa 'di ni gsungs ma thag ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:77b-15: de la thod pa zhes pa ni bud med de
T02D1909:77b-16: byi mi byung ba'i dkar dmar mtshan dang ldan pa'i
T02D1909:77b-17: nang du rlung gi gdan la bgegs kyi gzugs bris
T02D1909:77b-18: la / snying po rnams bkug nas gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1909:77b-19: rang gi sngags brjod cing rkang pas mnan pa'i tshul du byas na bud med 'gugs par byed do //
T02D1909:77b-20: pho dgug pa ni mo'i thod pa la dgug par bya'o //
T02D1909:77b-21: m'a ma k'i 'am zhes pa'i tshig gnyis kyis ni bsrung ba dang zhi bar bya'o //
T02D1909:77b-22: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags bstan pa ni de nas zhes pa rnams te /
T02D1909:77b-23: de la tshul bzhin byas na zhes pa ni cho ga bzhin te /
T02D1909:77b-24: las thams cad par gang gyur pas ras ma la sogs pa bab ma la /
T02D1909:77b-25: rlung la phyag mtshan rnams bri ba dang /
T02D1909:77b-26: de'i lte bar gang bsgrub pa'i gzugs bri ba ni
T02D1909:77b-27: dug dang ldong ros dang rngo rgyus dang khrag rnams
T02D1909:77b-28: kyis bya'o // de'i snying gar sngags ring 'di bkod la rang gis kyang bzlas pas /
T02D1909:77b-29: dngos po nyid zhi bar bsam pa ni /
T02D1909:77b-31: kun da li dang kha hi bar du ming gzhug pa ni spyi'i las so //
T02D1909:77b-32: yang gzhan gyis mi thub pa bstan pa'i phyir de
T02D1909:77b-33: nas zhes pa la sogs pa de la cho ga
T02D1909:77b-35: 'dir yang gzhan gyis mi thub par gyur pas /
T02D1909:78a-0: srin po la sogs pas zin pa'i bsgrub bya la @78a * //
T02D1909:78a-1: phan gdags pa'i phyir srin po la sogs pa'i gzugs
T02D1909:78a-2: grog mkhar dang ske tshe dang lan tshva dang dur
T02D1909:78a-3: khrod kyi thal ba dang dug la sogs pa la
T02D1909:78a-4: byas la / byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pas mo'i g-yon pa dang /
T02D1909:78a-5: pho'i g-yas pa nas gtubs te ;
T02D1909:78a-6: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du ye shes su byin gyis brlabs nas /

T02D1909:78a-8: gzhan pa ni gong ma bzhin du bya yang ske tshes nri bri /
T02D1909:78a-9: gzugs dngos ni khrag gam gcin gyis sprus la de
T02D1909:78a-10: nas bsreg / de ltar byas na gang gis zin
T02D1909:78a-11: pa las kyang thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1909:78a-12: da ni rta mgrin bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:78a-13: de la mkha' dbyings zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02D1909:78a-14: 'dir rta mgrin du gang gyur pas bsgrub bya'i snying
T02D1909:78a-15: gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la h'um dkar po bzhag
T02D1909:78a-16: nas / de'i 'od kyis lus thams cad kyi gnas
T02D1909:78a-17: la dug bsregs te lag pa g-yas pa las 'byung
T02D1909:78a-18: pa padma dkar po 'dab brgyad kyi snying po la
T02D1909:78a-19: h'um dkar po'i 'od zer 'phros pa'i bdud rtsi 'dzag
T02D1909:78a-20: nas / par bsam mo // de sa yi ges bskyed pa'i bsgrub bya'i lus la dug drangs nas /
T02D1909:78a-21: drangs pa la gzhan las 'phro bas gzung ba'i bdud
T02D1909:78a-22: rtsi dkar pos bsdus pa'i bsgrub bya'i lus la dug
T02D1909:78a-24: de'i ming dang phreng ba'i sngags brjod pas cher spel bar bya'o //
T02D1909:78a-25: de'i sbyor pas dug rnams med par byed pa'o //
T02D1909:78a-26: da ni be con sngon po can gyi don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:78a-27: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:78a-28: de la cho ga'i tshul bzhin zhes pa ni be
T02D1909:78a-29: con sngon por gang gyur pas bsgrub bya'i gzugs kho
T02D1909:78a-30: nyid kyi rkang rjes kyi sa dang /
T02D1909:78a-32: phub ma dang ro bsregs pa'i thal ba dang /
T02D1909:78a-33: de rnams la khrag dang gcin gyis sprus pa la gzugs byas te /
T02D1909:78a-34: de'i snying gar kho nyid kyi snying po bkod nas nam gyi gung la /
T02D1909:78b-0: yugs mo bsregs pa'i thal bas me'i dkyil 'khor zur gsum pa @78b byas nas /
T02D1909:78b-1: shing skyer ba'i me sbar te /
T02D1909:78b-2: de'i dbus su dzas bkug pa la khro bo'i rgyal
T02D1909:78b-3: po rang gi cha lugs dang ldan par gang gyur
T02D1909:78b-4: bas // gzugs brnyan gyi rkang pa nas mtshon cha bzang pos gtubs shing /
T02D1909:78b-5: shin tu khros pas ming bar du bcug ste /
T02D1909:78b-6: bskul ba dang bcas pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba 'di
T02D1909:78b-7: dus gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na sangs rgyas
T02D1909:78b-8: nyid kyang gsod par 'gyur zhes bstan pa yin no
T02D1909:78b-9: // rtsa brgyad bzlas zhes pa ltag 'og tu yang snyegs so //
T02D1909:78b-10: da ni stobs po che'i don bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes ba rnams smos te ;
T02D1909:78b-11: de la de'i cho ga ni dkyil 'khor gsum du zhes te /
T02D1909:78b-12: 'jig rten gsum du char ba dbab pa ni stobs
T02D1909:78b-13: po cher gang byung pas bsnyen pa rnams sngon du
T02D1909:78b-14: byas te / rang gi gnas gang yin par klu'i dkyil 'khor 'dab brgyad pa byas la /
T02D1909:78b-15: klu'i rgyal po rnams bkod de /
T02D1909:78b-16: phyogs dus la sogs pa rnams spyan drangs nas /
T02D1909:78b-18: mchod pa rnam lnga dang 'o mas mchod de /
T02D1909:78b-19: sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1909:78b-20: klu chen po khyed rnams kyis dus su char phob shig ces bsgo //
T02D1909:78b-21: des klu rnams kyis char gyi rgyun 'bebs par bsams nas /
T02D1909:78b-22: sngags kyi phreng ba 'di bzla bar bya'o //
T02D1909:78b-23: des rdzas gang la bya ba ni bum pa so
T02D1909:78b-24: ma btang ba la autpala lta bu ral gri rtse
T02D1909:78b-25: brgyad pa bris / de'i steng du dkyil 'khor padma 'dab brgyad ras la bris /
T02D1909:78b-26: de la aom shu li ni sv'a h'a /
T02D1909:78b-27: zhes kha dog sngon pos bris te de'i bar du snying po yi ge na gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1909:78b-28: de yang bum pa so ma btang ba dang kha sbyar nas /
T02D1909:78b-29: skud pa yang sngon pos dkris te /
T02D1909:78b-30: klu rnams dang shu li ni spyan drangs nas mchod de /
T02D1909:78b-31: drang ba ni yi ge dza'i bar du bcug pas nam phyed kyis drang ngo //
T02D1909:78b-32: de nas rdzas nyid rgya mtsho'am chu mig tu sba bar bya'o //
T02D1909:78b-33: de lta bu'i cho gas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1909:78b-34: des ma grub na bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T02D1909:78b-35: bdag gnod mdzes kyi rnal 'byor du byas la /
T02D1909:79a-0: grog mkhar gyis la sogs pa las stobs po che'i gzugs byas @79a * //
T02D1909:79a-2: ma h'a ba la dza zhes pas bkug nas bstims te /
T02D1909:79a-3: mngon spyod kyi dkyil 'khor du khro bo gnod mdzes nyid bsams te /
T02D1909:79a-4: de nyid zhal gdangs pa kho nar gzugs brnyan gyi rkang pa g-yon pa'i mthil nas brtsams te /
T02D1909:79a-5: gtubs shing gtsubs shing ma h'a ba la barsha pa

T02D1909:79a-7: mdzes kyi sngags khri phrag gcig bzlas nas sbyin sreg

T02D1909:79a-10: stobs po che cho ga rdzogs par byas nas /

T02D1909:79a-14: de la sbyor ba yis zhes pa 'dod pa'i rgyal por gang gyur pas /
T02D1909:79a-15: bsgrub bya'i gzugs dur khrod sol ba dang /
T02D1909:79a-16: phub ma grog mkhar gyi sa la sogs pa las bya ste /
T02D1909:79a-17: mtshan ma de rkang pa g-yas pas mnan cing sngags 'di'i bar du ming bcug ste /
T02D1909:79a-18: bkug cing bzlas na lha mthu bo che la sogs pa kun 'gugs par 'gyur ba'i don to //
T02D1909:79a-19: da ni mi g-yo mgon gyi sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:79a-20: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:79a-21: de la sngags 'dis zhes pa ni 'dir mi g-yo bar gang gyur pas /
T02D1909:79a-22: grog mkhar gyi sa la sogs pa las bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan byas te /
T02D1909:79a-23: de la lcags kyos shes pa bkug nas de nyid
T02D1909:79a-24: gong ma bzhin du rkang pa g-yas pas mnan te
T02D1909:79a-25: / bskul ba dang ldan pa'i sngags bzlas na ma
T02D1909:79a-26: h'a de ba la sogs pa rang rang gi chud
T02D1909:79a-27: ma dang bcas pa kun 'gas shing 'gugs par 'gyur
T02D1909:79a-28: / ba'i don to // da ni gnod mdzes kyi sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:79a-29: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:79a-30: de la 'di'i cho ga ni 'di lta ste ;
T02D1909:79a-31: bdag gnod mdzes su gang gyur pas /
T02D1909:79a-32: bud med kyi thod pa mtshan dang ldan pa la rkang pa g-yon pa'i srin lag gi khrag gis /
T02D1909:79a-33: bsgrub bya'i bud med kyi gzugs bris te /
T02D1909:79a-34: bkug nas thod pa de zhabs kyis mnan nas /
T02D1909:79b-1: bskul ba dang ldan pa'i sngags 'di bzla bar bya'o //
T02D1909:79b-2: de nas 'khor dang bcas pa'i bud med mthu can dgug pa'i mchog tu 'gyur pa'i don to //
T02D1909:79b-3: de ltar sngags kyi rgyu dang ldan pa'i las bstan pa ni de rnams te /
T02D1909:79b-5: da ni dgug pa gzhan lha'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'khor lo la sogs pa dang /
T02D1909:79b-6: lcags kyo'i sgo nas dgug pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:79b-7: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:79b-8: de la dam tshig chen po zhes pa rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1909:79b-9: de sku la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid 'byung
T02D1909:79b-10: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas byung ngo zhes
T02D1909:79b-11: 'brel to // gang phyung ba ni dam tshig chen po zhes pa rnams te /
T02D1909:79b-12: sku'i rdo rje la sogs pa gsum gyi gsang ba
T02D1909:79b-13: las 'dir gsung nyid mi 'da' ba'i tshig 'di zhes
T02D1909:79b-14: so // de la sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1909:79b-15: 'dod pa'i rdo rje sku gsung thugs gsum la rdo
T02D1909:79b-17: des lha rnams zhags pa dang lcags kyi 'dzin pa
T02D1909:79b-18: so sor spros nas sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'gugs nas
T02D1909:79b-19: gzhan rnams lta ci smos te dgug par bya'o //
T02D1909:79b-20: sku dang gsung gis dgug pa ni sangs rgyas gsung gi zhes pa mtha' yas kyi sbyor ba'o //
T02D1909:79b-21: snang mdzad kyi sbyor ba ni 'khor lo chen po'i zhes pas so //
T02D1909:79b-22: de gnyis kyi sbyor ba ni rang rang gi phyag
T02D1909:79b-23: mtshan gyi lcags kyos rdo rje sems dpa' 'gugs par
T02D1909:79b-25: spyir bstan pa ni cho ga ji lta bas rdo
T02D1909:79b-26: rje gsum bsgoms pas lha rnams 'khor lo dang padmo
T02D1909:79b-27: dang / rdo rje'i lcags kyo spros te bsngags te
T02D1909:79b-28: lha rnams thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ba'i don to
T02D1909:79b-29: dang / // rdo rje gsum gyi de ma thag
T02D1909:79b-30: gsungs pa ni thams cad ces pa la sogs pa
T02D1909:79b-31: dang / // ste / rdo rje dngos gzhi zhes
T02D1909:79b-32: pa rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi sa bon gyis
T02D1909:79b-34: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la dgug par bya ba kun sbyar na zhes te gnas par bsam mo //
T02D1909:79b-36: de nas bdag gi lus la lcags kyo thogs pa rnams spros te /
T02D1909:80a-0: dgug bya'i snying gar sbyar nas drangs na 'gugs par @80a * //
T02D1909:80a-2: zla ba la snang mdzad cho ga ji lta ba bzhin bsgoms nas /
T02D1909:80a-3: de'i spyan snga de nas brgya byin gyi btsun mo
T02D1909:80a-4: sha tsi rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas par bsams
T02D1909:80a-5: te / mi 'chi zhes pa bdud rtsi 'khyil ba
T02D1909:80a-6: grangs med pa lcags kyo 'dzin pa rnams snang nyid
T02D1909:80a-7: kyi ba spu'i bu ga gnas spros te /
T02D1909:80a-8: mi 'chi ba'i sngags gong du bstan pa la lan
T02D1909:80a-9: grangs lnga bcu brjod na dgug par 'gyur bas na
T02D1909:80a-10: dgug par bya'o // yang rdo rje kyo ba sngon
T02D1909:80a-11: po 'dra ba'i 'od 'dzin pa'i rdo rje dkyil 'khor
T02D1909:80a-12: bsgoms nas spro ba la sogs pa byas nas nam
T02D1909:80a-13: mkha'i bu mo zhes pa bar snang gi bu mo
T02D1909:80a-14: dgug par bya'o // ste / de 'gugs pa'i mchog go //
T02D1909:80a-15: rang gi khro bo zhes pa gnod mdzes bsgom pa ste /
T02D1909:80a-16: rang gi phyogs yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1909:80a-17: rlung la sa 'og na gnas pa dag dgug par bya ba yin te /
T02D1909:80a-18: 'di ltar rang gi snying ga nas lha rnams tri
T02D1909:80a-19: sh'u la rtse gcig pa dang rdo rje kyo ba
T02D1909:80a-21: sa 'og na gnas pa'i lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams dgug par bya ba'i don to //
T02D1909:80a-22: rigs gang du gyur ba'i rnal 'byor pas rdo rje kyo ba'i ji lta ba dang ldan par bya'o /
T02D1909:80a-23: btsag gam rdo rgyus gang rung khar bcug nas bsnyen
T02D1909:80a-24: pa la sogs pa rdzogs nas dang por zla ba
T02D1909:80a-25: gzas zin pa nas mthar gyi bar du spro ba
T02D1909:80a-26: la sogs pa'i cho ga byas na tshangs pa la
T02D1909:80a-27: sogs pa gang dgug pa'i ming bris nas /
T02D1909:80a-29: sngags bzlas pa la sogs pa byas na gdon mi za bar 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1909:80a-30: yang thog mar mtshan dpe'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i
T02D1909:80a-31: 'jam dpal bsgoms na de'i sbyor ba'i sprin las lcags
T02D1909:80a-32: kyo 'dzin pa'i gshin rje gshed bskal ba'i sreg pa
T02D1909:80a-33: dang 'dra ba spros nas des gnod sbyin mo'i ming
T02D1909:80a-35: sngags bzlas pa dang ldan pas bkug la spyad par bya'o //
T02D1909:80a-37: kun gyi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:80a-38: de la kun gyi phyag rgya ni gang yin pa'i khyad par ro //
T02D1909:80a-39: de so so'i sngags kyi khyad par gyis spro ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1909:80b-1: de'i gnas la sogs pa dang ldan par bstan pa ni dgug pa'i thabs su gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1909:80b-2: de la sa gzhan ba ste sgrub pa po rmongs pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:80b-3: stobs chung zhing cho ga dang mi ldan bzhin du
T02D1909:80b-4: byas na sbyor ba nyid 'jig par 'gyur bas de'i
T02D1909:80b-5: phyir rdo rje rgyal po bskul bar bya ba ni
T02D1909:80b-6: de bsgom pa sngags bzla ba la sogs pa ste
T02D1909:80b-7: / des ni gzhan dag kyang bya bar mngon no //
T02D1909:80b-8: de ston pa rab tu rtog pa ni 'dir thog
T02D1909:80b-9: ma dang tha ma med pa'i bdag nyid bas thams
T02D1909:80b-11: thugs gtso ba nyid kyi phyir dang /
T02D1909:80b-12: mos pa'i dbang gis 'dir rdo rje nyid kho na ston par mngon no //
T02D1909:80b-13: da ni ae ka tsa d'i ral ba gcig ma'i sngags dang don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:80b-14: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:80b-15: de la kun du sprul ba'i ye shes so //
T02D1909:80b-16: rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1909:80b-17: ting nge 'dzin ni de'i don la rtse gcig pa'o //
T02D1909:80b-18: de la gdon mi za ba'i tshul gyis zhugs nas phyung ngo zhes so //
T02D1909:80b-20: dam tshig chen mo zhes pa gzhan gyis mi thub ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:80b-21: de'i yang rgyal mo ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'di'o //
T02D1909:80b-22: de nyid mchog ni shu li ste de'o //
T02D1909:80b-23: sngags kyi rig pa 'dis zhes pa cho ga 'di ste /
T02D1909:80b-24: gang rdo rje gzhon nu cho ga ji lta bas bsgoms la /
T02D1909:80b-25: thor tshugs gcig ma rang gi sngags las bskyed pa'i sku dang /
T02D1909:80b-26: g-yas g-yon gyi zhal ni nag po dkar po dmar
T02D1909:80b-27: po'i rim pa bzhin sbyar nas bsgoms nas phyag dang
T02D1909:80b-28: po gnyis kyis yab la 'khyud pa'o //
T02D1909:80b-29: bar ma gnyis na thod pa dang dgang gzar bsnams pa /
T02D1909:80b-30: tha ma gnyis na rin po che dang ral gri 'dzin pa dang sbyor zhing /
T02D1909:80b-31: lcags kyo thogs pa'i lha rnams spros te /
T02D1909:80b-32: sha chen dang dur khrod kyi thal ba la sogs
T02D1909:80b-33: pa las dgug bya'i gzugs byas la gong ma bzhin
T02D1909:80b-34: rlung la gnas par bsams te /
T02D1909:80b-35: ming bar du bcug nas bkug nas /
T02D1909:80b-36: rkang pa g-yon pas mnan te /
T02D1909:80b-37: gzugs brnyan gyi dbral bar ming bris /
T02D1909:80b-38: snying gar sngags rdo rgyus kyis bris te gzhug la /
T02D1909:81a-0: bskul ba dang ldan pa'i sngags bzla ba la @81a * //
T02D1909:81a-1: sogs pa byas te bkug nas spyad par bya'o //
T02D1909:81a-2: de dang 'dra ba'i khro gnyer ma'i sngags dang don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:81a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:81a-4: de la so sor rtog pa'i rnam pa nam mkha'i
T02D1909:81a-5: dam tshig 'byung ba la 'od dpag med kyi tshul
T02D1909:81a-6: gyis zhugs nas phyung ngo zhes so //
T02D1909:81a-7: dam tshig chen mo nyid khro gnyer ma ste de'i sngags 'di zhes so //
T02D1909:81a-8: rig pa 'di dang dam tshig ces pa cho ga 'di ste /
T02D1909:81a-9: gang mtha' yas kyi rnam par gyur bas khro gnyer
T02D1909:81a-10: ma dang sbyor zhing sprul pa gong ma bzhin byas
T02D1909:81a-11: la dgug bya rnams bud med kyi thod pa la
T02D1909:81a-12: rlung la gnas pa'i gzugs kyi snying gar sngags bcug
T02D1909:81a-13: nas / rdo rgyus kyis bris te bkug nas rkang bas mnan te /
T02D1909:81a-14: bskul tshig dang ldan pa'i sngags bzlas na /
T02D1909:81a-15: rgyan cha dang ldan pa rnams 'gugs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1909:81a-16: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kho nas dgug pa ni /
T02D1909:81a-17: 'gog pa rdo rje zhes pa rnams te /
T02D1909:81a-18: gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin du sbyor ba dang ldan pas 'gugs par bstan te //
T02D1909:81a-19: da ni sngags 'ba' zhig kho na bzlas pas 'grub par bstan pa ni /
T02D1909:81a-20: yang na zhes pa rnams te /
T02D1909:81a-21: gang gi skur bsgoms nas gang de'i sngags bzlas na 'grub par bstan to //
T02D1909:81a-22: drag po'i sbyor ba'i bsgrub bya'i khyad par ni rdo
T02D1909:81a-23: rje slob dpon smod pa dang zhes pa rnams so
T02D1909:81a-24: // phyogs bcu'i zhes pa la sogs pa ni gsod nus par bstan pa ste ;
T02D1909:81a-25: brjod par bya ba'i dngos po rnams rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang ldan par bya'o //
T02D1909:81a-26: rang gi gnas su bsnyen pa la sogs pa byas nas khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du gang gyur pas /
T02D1909:81a-27: khrag dang chu dang bshang gcis gsher ba'i gos bgos nas /
T02D1909:81a-28: gang yin pa'i ling+ga rkang pas mnan te /
T02D1909:81a-29: khro bo'i ngang can gyis de'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na nges par 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D1909:81a-30: phyi ma la yang de ltar sbyar ro //
T02D1909:81a-31: de dag gi gnas ni ma mo'i gnas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:81a-32: da ni phur bu'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir mi'i zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:81b-0: @81b gshin rje gshed la sogs par gang gyur pas /
T02D1909:81b-1: dur khrod kyi gsol ba dang /
T02D1909:81b-3: khre dang tsu tsi'i phu ba ma dang /
T02D1909:81b-4: rang gi rkang rjes kyi rdul dang /
T02D1909:81b-5: chu 'gram gnyis kyi sa la dri chen dang dri chus sbrus te /
T02D1909:81b-7: de'i snying gar dur khrod kyi ras ma la khro bo'i rdo rje rnon po bris te /
T02D1909:81b-8: de'i bum pa na sngags kyi bar du bcug pa'i bsgrub bya'i ming du dug dang /
T02D1909:81b-10: tsha ba'i mar rnams kyis bris pa bcug ste /
T02D1909:81b-11: bkug nas 'dug pa la rgyu rus pa las byas
T02D1909:81b-12: pa tshad sor brgyad pa la rang gi khro bo'i
T02D1909:81b-13: sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas shing ling+ga dgra'i sgo
T02D1909:81b-14: khar khyer te gdab par bya /
T02D1909:81b-15: de nas de nyid kho nar sba bar bya'o //
T02D1909:81b-16: de nyid ni rdo rje rgya gram gyis kyang mnan par bya'o //
T02D1909:81b-17: shes dang mi shes spangs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D1909:81b-19: da ni bskrad pa'i las bstan pa'i phyir ;
T02D1909:81b-20: yang na zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:81b-21: de'i cho ga ni ya m'anta ka la sogs par gang gyur pas /
T02D1909:81b-22: thod pa yon tan dang ldan pa la sngags kyi bar du bsgrub bya'i ming bcug nas /
T02D1909:81b-26: ba blas bris te bkug nas gang ldan pas sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing /
T02D1909:81b-27: dgra'i sgo'am grong du bzhag na bskrad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1909:81b-28: las gzhan gsungs pa ta la'i zhes pa rnams te /
T02D1909:81b-29: ta la'i lo ma'am gzhan gro ga'am /
T02D1909:81b-30: ra sa sam shing shun nam /
T02D1909:81b-31: shog shog la bsgrub bya'i gzugs bris te /
T02D1909:81b-32: ming rus bar du bcug pa'i sngags bskul tshig dang
T02D1909:81b-33: ldan pa bris la bzlas pa la sogs pa bya
T02D1909:81b-34: zhing / de nyid dgra'i khyim mam sgor sbas na /
T02D1909:81b-36: de ltar bya zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1909:81b-37: da ni rigs kyi bye brag tshul gyis ni //
T02D1909:81b-38: rdo rje phur bus gdab par bya //
T02D1909:81b-39: zhes pas sku la sogs pa'i phur bus mngon spyod
T02D1909:81b-40: kyi las kyi sku gsung thugs kyi lha 'jig rten
T02D1909:81b-41: las 'das pa la gdab pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:81b-42: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:82a-0: de la sku la sogs pa nges par @82a * //
T02D1909:82a-1: 'ching ba ni nges par gcig tu dbyer med pa ste /
T02D1909:82a-2: de la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis zhugs nas
T02D1909:82a-3: thams cad gnon pa rdo rje khro bo rnams te
T02D1909:82a-4: / de'i rdo rje phur bus sngags 'di phyung ngo zhes so //
T02D1909:82a-5: 'di'i cho ga ni gang du gang gyur pas cho ga bzhin du gzugs brnyan byas te /
T02D1909:82a-6: de'i snying gar ming rus sngags kyi bar du bcug pa bcug ste mi'i rus pa'am /
T02D1909:82a-8: lcags las byas pa'i phur bu smad gsal shing stod dgra bgegs lta bu'i gzugs bsams nas /
T02D1909:82a-9: gang ldan pas aom gha gha gh'a ta ya zhes pa'i sngags bzlas shing gdab par bya'o //
T02D1909:82a-10: gdab pa'i tshul ni 'od 'phro 'khrug cing zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:82a-11: thabs dang shes rab tu ldan pa'i rdo rje sems
T02D1909:82a-12: dpa'i rigs dang 'brel pa'i stobs po che'i phur bu
T02D1909:82a-13: bzhag la / des thugs kyi rdo rje la cho ga ji lta ba bzhin gdab par bya'o //
T02D1909:82a-14: da ni snang mdzad kyi rigs dang 'brel pa'i gshin
T02D1909:82a-15: rje gshed kyi phur bus de'i sku'i rdo rje la
T02D1909:82a-16: cho ga ji lta ba bzhin gdab par bstan pa'i
T02D1909:82a-17: phyir / rnam par snang mdzad ces pa'i tshig smos so //
T02D1909:82a-18: yang na 'dod chags zhes pa ni cho ga ji
T02D1909:82a-19: lta bas rta mgrin gyi phur bus rang gi gsung
T02D1909:82a-20: gi rdo rje la gdab par bya'o //
T02D1909:82a-21: gshin rje gshed ces pa gong gi snang mdzad kyi rigs dang 'brel pa nyid de /
T02D1909:82a-22: des ni tshe dpag med dang 'brel pa'i rta mgrin
T02D1909:82a-23: kyang bsams na zhes bya bar shugs kyis mngon no
T02D1909:82a-24: // yang 'dir bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yis zhes pa /
T02D1909:82a-25: sku'i rdo rje la sogs pa gong du gsungs pa
T02D1909:82a-26: rnams la bdud rtsi nyid kyi phur bus cho ga
T02D1909:82a-27: ji lta ba bzhin du gdab par bstan pa yin
T02D1909:82a-28: te / de ni las thams cad pa'i bdag nyid yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1909:82a-29: de la bdag nyid chen po zhes pa /
T02D1909:82a-30: thams cad bdag nyid gang yin pa'o //
T02D1909:82a-31: gdab pa'i tshul ni cho ga ji lta bas de'i
T02D1909:82a-32: gnas snying ga nas rkang pa'i mthar rdo rje phur
T02D1909:82a-34: de ni gong du'ang sbyar bar bya'o zhes so //
T02D1909:82a-36: kyang zhes pa'i sgra ni gdon mi za ba'i tshig ste /
T02D1909:82b-0: gong @82b ma'i rim pas gdug cing khro ba la
T02D1909:82b-1: sogs pa'i bsgrub bya'i ming 'og nas 'byung ba'i sngags
T02D1909:82b-3: gzugs brnyan byas la gang yin pa bkug nas /
T02D1909:82b-4: gshin rje gshed la sogs par gang gyur pas de'i
T02D1909:82b-5: phur bus ji lta ba bzhin gdab par bya'o zhes
T02D1909:82b-6: pa'i don to // da ni cho ga de dag
T02D1909:82b-7: gi gdab pa'i sngags bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes
T02D1909:82b-8: pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:82b-9: de la sku'i rnam par sprul pa zhes pa /
T02D1909:82b-10: me long dang ldan pa'i rang gi las so //
T02D1909:82b-12: rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snang mdzad nyid kyi tshul gyis zhugs nas phyung ngo zhes 'brel to //
T02D1909:82b-13: de ltar gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig la yang ji lta ba bzhin sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1909:82b-14: de dag gi dam tshig gi gnod pa ni ting nge 'dzin gang dang ldan pas /
T02D1909:82b-15: sngags 'di drag tu bzlas pa tsam gyis shes so //
T02D1909:82b-16: de dag gi cho ga ni rang rang gi phyag
T02D1909:82b-17: mtshan dang ldan pas bya ba ste sngon du byas

T02D1909:86a-33: a'a kham th'a zhes pa ni sku gsung thugs su
T02D1909:86a-34: gang gyur pas gsang ba'i padma la rim pa dang
T02D1909:86a-35: rim pa ma yin pas gsang ba bzhag pa yin
T02D1909:86a-36: no / gsang ba nyid sku'i rdo rje la sogs pa la yang gzhag pa kho na ste /
T02D1909:86a-37: sdud pa dang gtong ba'i dbang gis zhi bar bya ba nyid yin no //
T02D1909:86a-38: rang rigs kyi lhar gyur pas bskul ba ni /
T02D1909:86a-39: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
T02D1909:86a-41: snying po dang 'od zer gyi lcags kyos khams gsum dang srid gsum gang yin pa dgug pa'o //
T02D1909:86b-0: de bsgrub pa'i gsang @86b ba'i gnas kyang nyams dga'i zhes pa ste /
T02D1909:86b-1: zla bas zhes pa 'grub pa'i dus gsungs so //
T02D1909:86b-2: ri rab ces pa yon tan te /
T02D1909:86b-3: brjod kyis mi lang pa'i 'khor rnams dang lhan cig bar skye ba 'grub bo //
T02D1909:86b-4: mngag gzhug pas zhes pa bskul ba ste /
T02D1909:86b-5: 'od zer gyi lha mos gang dgug pa khugs pa kho na ste /
T02D1909:86b-6: rang gi sku nyid kyis ni ma yin no //
T02D1909:86b-7: dam tshig bskul ba la sogs pa bzhi ni rim pa bzhin du gnas pa yin te /
T02D1909:86b-8: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa bsgoms te /
T02D1909:86b-9: 'od zer gyis dkyil 'khor bskul ba dang /
T02D1909:86b-10: ye shes de gsang ba'i gnas su 'phen ba dang /
T02D1909:86b-13: de'i tshe skul sog pa'i 'od zer gyi 'jig rten du don byas te bsdu ba'i rim pas /
T02D1909:86b-14: gong bu la thim ste de nyid rmad du byung ba'i gzugs so//
T02D1909:86b-15: dgug cing dbang du bya ba ni sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:86b-17: stobs po che'i skur bsgoms la dbu rgyan la sogs pa'i don dang ldan par byas te /
T02D1909:86b-18: dang por skrag par byas te dgug pa'i cho ga gang yin pas so //
T02D1909:86b-19: sangs rgyas mchog ces pa ni rang gi lhar gang byas pas gnas rnams su /
T02D1909:86b-20: sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge bkod nas /
T02D1909:86b-21: de'i spro bsdu'i sbyor bas sku'i rdo rje la sogs pa bsgrub pa ste /
T02D1909:86b-22: gang yin pa'i cho gas 'grub pa kho na'o //
T02D1909:86b-23: kha zas kyi ting nge 'dzin ni bkres skom zhes pa rnams te /
T02D1909:86b-24: lha'i gzugs su gang sbyor bas kha zas bdud rtsir gang gyur pa /
T02D1909:86b-25: aom la sogs pa kha dang lce dang mgul la bsams te /
T02D1909:86b-26: bza' ba'i sbyor bas zos na rdo rje gsum dag 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1909:86b-27: btsun mo dam pa'i mchog dgug pa ni de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1909:86b-28: de la sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1909:86b-29: nam mkha'i dbus su gzhal yas khang brtsegs pa la bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1909:86b-30: des gang dgug pa rgyan rnams rdzogs shing ser la
T02D1909:86b-31: 'gying bag tu 'dug pa ral ba'i dbu rgyan can
T02D1909:87a-1: bkug la brtsam par bya ba ni spyad par bya ba'i tha tshig go /
T02D1909:87a-2: tsun da dgug pa gsungs pa de nas zhes pa rnams te /
T02D1909:87a-3: gdan nyi ma'i gzhal yas khang brtsegs pa la bsams te /
T02D1909:87a-4: der sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor bsgoms te /
T02D1909:87a-5: dgug pa'i cho gas bud med rgyan dang ldan pa
T02D1909:87a-6: kha dog dkar mo bsam par byas te gsang ba
T02D1909:87a-7: la 'jug go // yang nor lha bsgrub pa gsungs pa /
T02D1909:87a-8: de nas dzam zhes pa ste /
T02D1909:87a-9: sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dbyings su bsam pa gong ma
T02D1909:87a-10: bzhin byas la gzugs brnyan la dgug pa byas te
T02D1909:87a-12: gnod sbyin gyi gzugs 'dzin pa ral ba'i dbu rgyan
T02D1909:87a-13: can rgyan thams cad rdzogs pa de sangs rgyas lnga'i
T02D1909:87a-14: cho gas gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1909:87a-15: dbu la brtag pa byas te mchod pa rdzogs par byas nas ci 'dod pa nod par bya'o //
T02D1909:87a-16: 'on kyang mnyes shing 'grub par gsungs so //
T02D1909:87a-17: de'i gnod sbyin mo bsgrub pa ni de nas zhes pa rnams te /
T02D1909:87a-18: gsang ba'i gnas su dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas /
T02D1909:87a-19: gang bsgrub pa de gong ma'i cho gas so //
T02D1909:87a-20: rgyas par ma bshad de bla ma'i rim pa las shes par bya'o //
T02D1909:87a-21: gzhan yang dngos grub phra mo gsungs pa /
T02D1909:87a-23: gzhal yas khang brtsegs pa la snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor bsgoms te /
T02D1909:87a-24: mi snang ba bsgrub na gser 'od dang 'dra ba'am
T02D1909:87a-25: 'jam dpal 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes so
T02D1909:87a-26: // bsgrub pa thams cad ni sngon du btang ba
T02D1909:87a-27: rdzogs nas rdzas dang ri mo dang gzugs brnyan la
T02D1909:87a-28: brten te gang bsgrub pa'i cho gas brtag pa byas
T02D1909:87a-29: // na / 'grub pa la gdon mi za ba kho na yin no /
T02D1909:87a-31: // / da ni rig pa'i rtul zhugs kyi dbang bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:87a-32: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1909:87a-33: de la gong ma'i rim pas sangs rgyas gnas khang dang dkyil 'khor gsal bar byas te /
T02D1909:87a-34: dbang gi rim pas bsgrubs la /
T02D1909:87b-0: gzungs kyi dbu @87b rgyan la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:87b-1: lo grangs la sogs pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa de rgyan gyis brgyan la /
T02D1909:87b-2: de la rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya ba ste gsal bar ni ma bris so //
T02D1909:87b-3: de'i gsang ba'i rol ba bya ba dang /
T02D1909:87b-4: sngags kyi rgyud ces te dam tshig la sogs pa bsgrags pa'o ;
T02D1909:87b-7: rig ma bsten nas dbang nod pa gang yin pa'o //
T02D1909:87b-8: de'i dus su don rig pas brtul zhugs byed pa ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs zhes te /
T02D1909:87b-9: bshang gci dang bza' ba'i sbyor ba rnams dang /
T02D1909:87b-10: nor rnams rku ba la sogs pa bya ba kho na yin te /
T02D1909:87b-11: la la dag dgongs pas bshad par bya'o //
T02D1909:87b-12: le'u bcu drug pa'i don rdzogs so /
T02D1909:87b-14: // / de ltar bdag dbang gsum dang ldan pa'i sgo nas /
T02D1909:87b-15: gzhan gyi don du bzhi pa dang bcu drug pa'i ri mo'i dkyil 'khor la brten nas /
T02D1909:87b-16: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don mthar phyin par bya ba dang /
T02D1909:87b-18: gdams pa gnang ba la sogs pa gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:87b-19: de la mi bskyod ces pa lnga ni dkyil 'khor
T02D1909:87b-20: gyi bdag po la 'khor gyi rigs lnga ye shes
T02D1909:87b-22: bstod pa'i gsung nyid kyang sgra mthar stong ste /
T02D1909:87b-25: ae ma'o zhes pa'i tshig bzhi'o //
T02D1909:87b-26: dam tshig bzhi bsrung ba ni /
T02D1909:87b-27: de nas zhes pa rnams te rang lha nye bar gyur pas dam tshig bzhi bsrung ba ni /
T02D1909:87b-28: sha chen la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:87b-29: sha chen gyi dam tshig dang bshang gci'i dam tshig dang /
T02D1909:87b-30: khrag dang khu ba'i dam tshig dang /
T02D1909:87b-31: sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ste sku gsung thugs
T02D1909:87b-32: su gang sbyor bas gong gi sbyor ba kun spyad
T02D1909:87b-34: gzhan rang sangs rgyas kyi dam tshig ni de nas zhes pa dang /
T02D1909:87b-35: rang sangs rgyas kyi dam tshig ces pa ste /
T02D1909:87b-36: de dag lus kyi ston pa ni gsung la mi brten pa ste /
T02D1909:87b-37: rang gi lus kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /
T02D1909:88a-0: spyod pa'i khyad par dang sku'i dam tshig la gnas pas mthar phyin par @88a * //
T02D1909:88a-2: / nyan thos kyi dam tshig ni de nas zhes pa dang /
T02D1909:88a-3: dge ba bcu zhes pa ste /
T02D1909:88a-5: mos pa chung ngu'i dam tshig mthar phyin pa'o //
T02D1909:88a-6: 'jig rten pa'i dam tshig gsungs pa /
T02D1909:88a-7: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1909:88a-8: dam tshig 'di dag ni rang rang gi spyod pa'i khyad par te /
T02D1909:88a-9: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis gsang ba bsgrub pa na /
T02D1909:88a-10: rang rang gi dam tshig sbyin pa ste /
T02D1909:88a-11: 'on kyang phan pa sgrub pa nyid de ci dgar 'grub po //
T02D1909:88a-12: sngags kyi bdag po'i dam tshig ni 'di yang yin te /
T02D1909:88a-13: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D1909:88a-15: nyan thos la gang sku gsung thugs su sbyor bas phyag bya ba ma yin te /
T02D1909:88a-16: de nyes par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:88a-17: gal te na de dag gi skra mtshams su rang gi lha gzhag pa yin no //
T02D1909:88a-18: sngags pa de nyid kyang bsam gtan kho na la 'jug pa yin te /
T02D1909:88a-19: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi spyod pa rnams thabs du mas dgag pa yin no //
T02D1909:88a-20: gang dkyil 'khor de nyid shes shing bsnyen pa la
T02D1909:88a-21: sogs pa dang ldan pas dus gsum gyi bde bar
T02D1909:88a-22: gshegs pa la zhing khams bshang gci la sogs pas
T02D1909:88a-23: bkang ste ; rgyas par dbul ba ni de nas phyag na rdo rje zhes pa rnams so //
T02D1909:88a-24: dam tshig 'di dag ni bdag dang gzhan la phan
T02D1909:88a-25: pa'i phyir bshad kyi gcig kho na'i don du ni
T02D1909:88a-26: ma yin no // de nas rgyas par zhus pa dang /
T02D1909:88a-27: lan gsungs pa ni de nas yang zhes gsungs pa'o //
T02D1909:88a-28: de la dang por cang mi gsung bar bzhugs pa zhus pa ste /
T02D1909:88a-30: de nas 'jam dpal zhes pa la sogs pa ni rang rang gi mjal stangs zhus pa ste /
T02D1909:88a-31: sku gsung thugs kyi don nyid brtag par dka' ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:88a-32: de'i lan ni de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la mngon no //
T02D1909:88a-33: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes rgyas par gsungs pa
T02D1909:88a-34: ni snying po don bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor zhus pa
T02D1909:88a-35: dang / de'i lan gsungs pa ste /
T02D1909:88a-36: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du gang gyur pas /
T02D1909:88b-0: de bzhin gshegs @88b pa'i ye shes kyi gsang ba la brtag par bya ba yin no //
T02D1909:88b-1: slob dpon la ji ltar blta ba ni /
T02D1909:88b-2: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' byams pas zhes pa rnams te /
T02D1909:88b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang bdag cag gi pha'o ma'o snyam du 'dzin cing /
T02D1909:88b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bas
T02D1909:88b-5: kyang slob dpon gyi ba spu'i bu ga gcig 'phags
T02D1909:88b-6: so zhes te / don gyi ngo bo nyid du tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:88b-7: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bla ma de nyid la gnas par gsungs pa /
T02D1909:88b-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis zhes pa rnams te /
T02D1909:88b-9: slob dpon la nod par gsungs so /
T02D1909:88b-10: lus ngag sems gang la gnas par yang /
T02D1909:88b-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol ba zhes pa ste /
T02D1909:88b-12: slob dpon nyid byang chub sems dpa' tha mi dad
T02D1909:88b-13: cing gsang ba'i bdag nyid ldan pas de skad ces
T02D1909:88b-14: bya'o // de nas yang zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D1909:88b-15: ni rdo rje 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor zhus pa ste
T02D1909:88b-16: bya'o // / rten gyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje
T02D1909:88b-17: 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin du bsams te
T02D1909:88b-18: bya'o // / / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mdun
T02D1909:88b-19: du dmigs la mchod pa rnams rdzogs par byas te
T02D1909:88b-20: bya'o // / / / rang gi sku la sogs
T02D1909:88b-21: pa'i rdo rje la dbang bskur ba ni bde bar
T02D1909:88b-22: gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin te
T02D1909:88b-23: bya'o // / / / / dbab par bya zhes te bskur ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1909:88b-24: de'i sbyor ba la dbab pa dang /
T02D1909:88b-25: kha zas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D1909:88b-27: sbyor ba'i cho ga dang drag shul gyi bya ba dang /
T02D1909:88b-29: de'i bsam gtan la gnas na bsod nams kyi tshogs mi bya ba dang /
T02D1909:88b-30: dug 'byin cing gnon pa dang lus ngag sems bsrung ba'i cho ga dang /
T02D1909:88b-31: ma mo la sogs pa'i gnas su rdo rje aa dza na sgrub pa'i thabs dang ;
T02D1909:88b-33: de dag gi cho ga ni bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya'o//
T02D1909:88b-34: gsang ba'i yi ge gsungs pa /
T02D1909:88b-35: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa nas /
T02D1909:88b-36: cang mi smra bar gyur to zhes pa'i bar du ste /
T02D1909:89a-0: yi ge ni sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge @89a * //
T02D1909:89a-2: byang chub sems dpas ni rtogs par dka' bar ma zad /
T02D1909:89a-3: de bzhin gshegs pas kyang rtogs par dka' ste /
T02D1909:89a-4: yi ge de nyid ma thos par mngon par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
T02D1909:89a-6: yi ge ni chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
T02D1909:89a-8: chos dang bsod nams kyi rgyu 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1909:89a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes gsungs pa bzhi ni lha mo bzhi'i dbyangs kyis bskul ba ste /
T02D1909:89a-10: chos kyi sku gang yin pas 'gro ba la snang ba ma yin pas /
T02D1909:89a-11: de'i phyir dgyes pa'i bstod pas gzugs kyi skur bskul bar mdzad de /
T02D1909:89a-12: 'dod chags kyi rjes su byang chub chud pa nyid de /
T02D1909:89a-13: de'i don gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1909:89a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes zhes pa nas /
T02D1909:89a-15: 'dug go zhes pa'i bar rnams ni yongs su gtang ba ste /
T02D1909:89a-16: de yang sangs rgyas kyi bka' yun ring gnas shing phan gdags pa'i phyir /
T02D1909:89a-17: skal ba mchis pa'i phyir zhes de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1909:89a-18: thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bos
T02D1909:89a-20: sdud pa po rdo rje chos la dmigs kyis gtad pa'o //
T02D1909:89a-21: dbang bskur nas de bzhin bgyi'o //
T02D1909:89a-23: shes pa'i rgyud la gnas nas /
T02D1909:89a-24: yongs su chub par byas so //
T02D1909:89a-25: cang mi gsung pa ni gong gi bdag nyid rnams de'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1909:89a-26: de dang de nyid du 'brel pas de skad ces bya ste /
T02D1909:89a-27: ci yang ma yi pa nyid dang ldan pas gsang ba'i don la zhugs pa se /
T02D1909:89a-28: mnyam pa nyid du lhun gyis grub par sbyor ba'o //
T02D1909:89a-29: le'u bcu bdun pa'i don rdzogs so /
T02D1909:89a-31: // / brjod par bya ba'i rgyud 'di yi //
T02D1909:89a-32: dgongs pa nye bar len pa'i 'grel //
T02D1909:89a-33: rdo rje bzhad pa'i slob dpon gyis //
T02D1909:89a-34: sems can ye shes bskyed phyir te //
T02D1909:89a-35: 'di brtsams pa las byung ba yis //
T02D1909:89a-36: dge ba dri med gang yin pa ;
T02D1909:89a-37: / yang dag slob ma dri med dang //
T02D1909:89a-38: sems can kun gyis thob par shog / rgyud kyi
T02D1909:89a-39: rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dgongs pa thams
T02D1909:89a-40: cad nye bar len pa'i 'grel ba rdzogs so /
T02D1909:89a-42: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzny'a na garbha dang /
